start.state: Alright, Dealer! I’ll purify your akuma before my transformation runs out!
Pardon me if this gets a little buggy!
Tikki said there were lots of embarrassed people here for some reason...I should find out why.

case.state: Sorry about this, ~name~.
I’ve been doing Superheroics for almost half a decade, and I’ve seen a lot because of it.
No more evil-doing for you!
Hmm... But will it contain an akuma?
Alright, ~name~, you can surrender whenever you’d like!
~name~, don’t get too embarrassed, I don’t want Hawk Moth to evilize you!
Um. Jane, please don’t think too hard about what’s under my mask.
Er...Zizou, how do you know her breasts are better? Can you use your sorcery to see through clothes?
So ~name~ is an alien? Like... From space? ...Really? That's-- That's so cool!
Okay, if you're really an alien, I have got to learn more about the fashion from ~name~'s world.
You know, ~name~, it’s always easy to tell when someone’s an American, and your superheroes have definitely taught me a lot about justice!
Sorry, ~name~, I prefer a different kitty cat to you.
I like my kitty cats a bit more... Obnoxious and a lot less at a strip poker game, ~name~.
Oh dear, ~name~, you have to be possessed by Hawk Moth. No normal person would... Act like you're acting.
~name~, you remind of me of my friend Alya, always trying the bottom of things. Er! To get to the bottom! Not butt... things…(But Alya did say…)
Ryuko, your act isn’t impressing anyone else either…
You seem like a jerk, ~name~.
Pfft. Everyone knows monsters aren’t real. At least if we can get you to settle down, it shouldn’t be too hard to stop the akuma possessing you.
The Mushroom Kingdom? Where’s that, ~name~? It sounds magical!
W-wait… A-are you not human, ~name~? T-that’s a real thing? / Well, even if you aren’t human, you’re still a person to me, ~name~!
Hey, ~name~, I think I'd be a pretty good candidate for Overwatch, don't you think?
A-an elf? Is ~name~ an elf?! I love all the folklore about elves!
As much as Chloe acts like a princess, she’s such a brat.
You’re much much nicer than Chloe, though. Personality and appearance-wise.
I can’t say I’m a big fan of robots ever since Max’s got possessed…
Doesn't this violate one of Asimov's rules, or something, ~name~?
You know, I've heard great things about Beacon!
Hey, ~name~, it’ll be okay. We’re all friends here. Mostly... .
~name~, you don’t, or can’t, really talk much, right? I guess actions speak louder than words, though! I’m sure you have quite a voice regardless.
Huh, do you happen to know Tikki, ~name~? She’s the kwami of my Miraculous, and a really great teacher. I kind of wish she hadn’t um. Informed me of this game, though.
Oh! You have to be some sort of spirit, right, ~name~? Do you happen to know a kwami named Tikki?
Um. That tail is attached to your spine, right, ~name~? I really hope so and it's not one of those gross... You know... Er...
~name~, it doesn't matter who you're working for! You're going down!
Those wings are really cool, ~name~! Have you um. Considered flying out of here, though?
W-wait, are the two of you pirates? Are you the akumatized people I'm here to stop?
Zut! Why did you bring a gun in here?
I really hope you aren't planning on using that thing to hurt people.
Aimee... I can't quite place your accent... But you sound... American?
Oh, of course you'll give up the gun first. Then you'll take off the bands one by one.
O-oh no! Aimee I warned you!
I can probably avoid or ignore the gunfire, but not everyone else can. Please be very careful!
Gah! I’m not a speed-type hero! I don’t know if I can catch...
Er... I guess you didn't transform as much as shot off your clothes.
Aimee, how can you scare a sweet and innocent person like Florina? Won’t you think of her?
I-I'm a little worried about the continued gunplay, Aimee.
Aimee, this is getting really dangerous. Without clothes or armor...
Futaba, for all that’s holy, stop encouraging her!!!
Uhm. With the way things are going, I can see this getting very dangerous when you run out of clothes.
Okay. Surely you'll part with that incredibly dangerous weapon now, right?
Okay, Aimee. You're down to almost nothing. I mean, Blake was embarrassed when she had to take off her ribbon...
Aimee, even Kyoko took off her gloves before her underwear, now's the time to lose the gun, right?
Even Revy put away her guns...
I'm going to assume you'll be keeping the gun...
Aimee, I'll even help you undress if you just... stop shooting. Please. For goodness sakes.
Hmm... So you're digital? As in you aren't real?
Amalia, do you have some sort of Miraculous?
Hmm... Amalia, I have a feeling you use a Miraculous too, don't you?
You speak French too, so it's not that much of a stretch! But it's a bit of a faux pas to use your names and powers at the same time, oui?
Based on the way you're playing, Amalia...
Wait, Amy, are you using the hedgehog Miraculous?
Ohmygosh, Ann Takamaki!? The model from Japan? We have so much in common!
You definitely strike me as someone who finds a good balance between hero and renegade.
While you're here, we could stop by my parents'?
Is your hair natural? I've heard you're a quarter American, but...
You seem smart, Annie!
That sweater looks pretty comfortable. And I like the color!
Hmm… Is this to psyche us out, or to distract us?
Oh! You've been very self-conscious about this, have you been padding--
You know, April, my friend Alya also reports on animal-themed superheroes…
Arwen! You were one of my biggest heroes growing up!
You know, Arwen, I really meant it. You were a big inspiration... You come from such a diverse background...
Wow, Asuna! You have so much enchanted equipment!
Hmm... Ayano, you seem off but I can’t quite figure out why…
Okay, I think I’ve seen enough of you to be really, really worried. Ayano, try and be a healthier person, or Hawk Moth is surely going to turn you into a villain!
We should get you to a hospital, Ayano. I… Think you’re beyond my help.
Ayano, please, give up.
Ayano, do you have something against the rest of us? Your comments have been pretty mean... I don’t want you to be akumatized.
You know, Ayano, this game might be a bit stressful, but it’s supposed to be fun... I hope you can relax and be a bit less... creepy towards senpa- I mean, ~player~...
Don’t get too mad, Blackrose! You seem really upset. And well armed. I wouldn’t want Hawk Moth to akumatize you!
I hope that wasn’t an insulting statement earlier...Red eyes and pale hair are very unusual where I’m from...
S-sorry for my earlier comment, the two of you do look kind of similar. And Rinkah’s from the Flame Tribe…
U-uhm. I think Blake is really cute b-but I think Yang is more invested. Interested. You. Uhm. Know what I mean?
O-oh! I’m a bit slow on the uptake. I’m sorry Blake, I didn’t realize you and Yang were together!
Cat Noir is always trying to kiss me, you know?
The tension between you and Yang must make for good teamwork. Believe me, I’d know.
W-well you did say you'd done this before. And you seem really worth getting to know.
Hmm... Being a Slayer sounds like you could really benefit from a Miraculous...
Er... I know your type, Chiaki. Do you get really embarrassed when you lose?
Er… Freddy Fazbear’s? I think I’ve heard of that restaurant...
H-hey! Is it actually lucky, or are you just saying that? I can show you a real lucky charm if you want.
I-I mean if giving up small stuff protects you from feeling poorly, then it definitely counts!
Corrin! I love the stories I've heard of you! You're so uplifting!
Great! I know you're quite a skilled warrior, and you definitely don't seem to be having a crisis of confidence.
Y-you know. I really hope this isn't a tactical maneuver to get at my Miraculous... Hawk Moth's tried that a few times...
Hmm... You know, I'm not an armorer... But I can see some... Stylistic... Improvements I could make.
Is all armor from... Hmm... Is it all so complicated?
For such elaborate armor and such a striking appearance, I have to say your attire... Uhm. Isn't quite as interesting.
Hm. You and Lyn both come from the same place, right? Are the Sacean Plains the fashionable part of the world?
Wow! D.Va! I’m normally a fighting game person but everyone knows who you are!
If her mech weren’t just technology, I could be convinced that D.Va is Hana’s superhero identity.
That’s clever, Daisy! Got it! So, if you get too rattled, Daisy, I’ll break your crown!
I actually think we’d have gotten along well in high school, Daria.
You’re pretty different from the others. More sarcastic than Nino, smarter than Chloe, cuter than Alyx...
You think love triangles are hard?
Wow! I love your fashion sense...
Do you... Also think girls look cute, by any chance, Dark Magician Girl?
Sorry about that Dawn, girls with blue hair need to stick together!
Ugh, puns. Always the puns.
Elena, if you don't want to play-
Don't worry Elena! I'm doing pretty well so far, so I can protect you!
Ah, Elena! I can't let you lose anymore! I'm doing a really bad job as a royal protector!
Gah! Elena, do you have a headband or something?!
Elena wait your wristb-
I really admire someone who can wear a skirt. I'm... really not a dress type of girl.
If it makes you feel better, I think it's a pretty skirt.
Elena, I... Uhm. Don't think it's right to abuse political power... But... You didn't really ask to be here so...
It's a bit vintage but I like the way your outfit comes together.
I think there's probably a Songbird miraculous to go with your locket! It seems like it's a good fit for you, for some reason, Elizabeth!
So you can... teleport? Are you sure you don't have some sort of guardian spirit? Wait, his name is Booker? What's a Booker?
Er... If you come to Paris I can definitely get you some new clothes as it seems like you're rubbing out.
Err... N-not really the kitty I normally work with...
You know, I bet some people get really turned on by the whole shaving thing...
I-I like your hair, Florina!
Florina… Florina… Hey, Florina… It’s your turn…
Please tell me you weren’t paying attention, and um… Weren’t fixating on Zone-tan.
Definitely not! Change is part of life, as is adventure, Florina! Don’t give up!
GoGo Tomago? Didn’t your friend just buy you equipment for your powers?
Now you’re definitely not wearing a superhero costume...
A superhero has a sense of dignity.
Whoa, Gwen, your suit? L-like, the whole thing?
So, now that you’re taking off… Um, the rest of your suit, are you going to tell me-- Er, us, the story?
U-uhm. I-if it’s for you--oooour value of the *international superhero community*...
W-well, Gwen, looks like lit’s lour… looks like it’s your… Um...
’Daddy’s Little Monster’? You are so tasteless…
Hmm, that’s really well worn! Is it an Agreste?
An athletic superhero who has to balance her academic life...With great fashion sense! You seem awfully familiar…
Wow, you really prepared to come! E-erk, came prepared!
I’m impressed by your bravery, Kim! I’m a little more conservative than that...
Cheerleader? Hmm… Oh! You’re a pom pom girl, Kim?
You and Shego really have a longstanding relationship, don't you, Kim?
The Avatar? Whoa, you’re like a Kwami of your own! It must be so cool to have the power to manipulate all of the elements!
The Water Tribe? Where is that supposed to be?
Kyoko, I like your outfit!
Er. Okay, you’re just like this, right, Kyu?
Hmm. That’s her last small item...
Definitely not akumatized. What a relief!
O-oh. Well, I’m surprised you kept them on so long!
Wait, you can do that !?
So, just… Wow, Kyu. I’m not used to someone losing so quickly.
You know, Lilith, are the Sirens a band?
Sirens are… Kind of magical? Sort of?
Um, Lilith, I think your tattoos are really cool!
I tend to like more natural looks.
What's your kwami like, Lux? It must be nice to have so much extra armor over your suit...
That’s a nice sword, but is it a Miraculous or is it possessed by an Akuma?
That’s a nice sword, but is it a Miraculous or--Oh! I suppose if Florina knows about it, it’s definitely something like that!
Wow, where are you from?
Um. D.Va, vampires aren’t real, I don’t think. She’s clearly akumatized. And even then, she doesn’t seem hostile...
Huh? Bubblegum? Don’t you usually chew that? What does that have to do with Marceline? Does she have a rubber or bubble based akuma power?
Meg! Don't worry, I can deakumatize these "Slasher" villains of yours with no trouble.
Wait, you're Mei Ling, the famous climatologist?
Mei, after this, can you tutor me in Mandarin?
Meia, your hair is so pretty! Where did you and Corrin get your hair done?
Mercy, I can tell by your accent that you’re Swiss, right? My family--I mean, a friend’s family uses only the best Swiss chocolate in their baking!
You're so eager to get naked!
E-er... Okay, so you're floating, you look like a demon, and you're getting a little... Aggressive.
Ah, don’t worry Nagisa, we’ll see this through together!
You’re worth lots, Nagisa. Don’t lose heart, everyone can enjoy time with friends!
Are you in surry to hemove your rocks? Er. A hurry to remove your socks, Nagisa?
Hmm… Tarou Urashima… That’s the story about the time traveler… But why would that make you ahead…?
No need to get worried, Nagisa! I’m right here with you. And friends make it better, right? Or...Um, more tolerable.
It’s alright, Nagisa. I can definitely tell you’re playing better than last round!
Shego, if you try and hurt Nagisa, I won’t show you any mercy!
Hmm...I don’t think anyone will laugh, Nagisa. And that’s a really clever idea!
Erk, sorry Nagisa. But at least you’re experiencing something new?
Nagisa, I can smell the bakery on you!
It’s okay Nagisa. Sometimes, the people you meet in passing, you get to know far better than you might think.
Wow Nagisa! You’re really giving it your all now, aren’t you?
I-I’d offer to let you borrow my bra, if it wasn’t against the rules, we seem like we’re the same size...
Er-Well. Um. I-
I-Um. Okay! Something!
Wait, your name is Neopolitan... like the ice cream, or the Italian area? Do you just not speak a language with us?
Oh goodness, you don’t even need an akuma, you have a really vicious aura about you…
Wait, you’re an imposter! You aren’t Neo at all!
Wait, you’re an imposter! You aren’t Neo at all!
Wait, I think I’ve seen a statue of you. Are you really Palutena?
Two goddesses? Wow, this game must be really important!
Hmm...Palutena, you’re a little bit of a trickster, aren’t you? I bet you and Tikki would get along.

Don’t worry, Palutena. Even if you do get embarrassed, I can deakumatize you really quickly. I mean, I’d have to. A god with akuma powers would be really scary...Especially someone as powerful as you!
Even if you’re a goddess, you’re still in this Palutena, and I won’t go easy on you!
Hmm... You seem a bit... unusual, Pearl.
A chiffon! I-I mean a friend in fashion school would love to talk more about that with you!
I think we have a lot in common, Raven!
You know, I heard they let people bring weapons to the game… I was a bit surprised...
Er. My yo-yo is most ly used to disarm people…
Red! You’re getting really…
W-wait, it can talk? Is this like Robustus?
Wait a second, red and black together... That's why they call you a ladybug pair! Quelle chance!
Samus Aran? I’ve heard of you!
Samus, my powers are kind of similar to yours! I suit up and then have to build my own powerups each time.
I thought mercenary-types regularly played cards in seedy bars. A-are you just throwing?
I’ve never seen a military outfit like that one before, Sayla. I like it, it’s very bright! Judging by your attitude, you’re bright as well!
Um...Scarlet Witch, that outfit looks… Very… Um. Everyone can almost see your…
Um… Did you hex the cards, Wanda? My Miraculous is behaving strangely…
The good stuff? Sure! Wait, you aren’t showing the good stuff already?
Sei... Asagiri. Asthagiri? Hmm... I can't tell if that's a Japanese or Indian name.
So, you're another hero! Just... one of the drunker ones, it seems.
Uhm. Sei, you’ve never gone mad with power, right?
You know, I do have to say I really appreciate the work the police do. I don’t stop criminals of the... normal variety.
I don't really drink but... Wow, those look tasty.
Seven of Nine? I’m sorry, did something get translated wrong? Sept de Neuf? Mme. Neuf?
You sound really familiar, Shantae…
Hmm, okay, so you aren’t a swordswoman. Do you manipulate time? Maybe… You have a thing for girls with pink hair?
Oh! You worked for REVOCs, right?
Okay, I’ve heard you on TV. Are you that actually that famous japanese runner? Miki Makimura?
Agh, Shantae, I give up.
Hmm... You seem familiar...
Sheena, you're a summoner, right? Maybe you can help improve my bond with Tikki!
W-wait, you're Shego, right? Don't you willingly serve evil?
Kim Possible and Ladybug are going to take you down, Shego! No more evil-doing!
Shego, you should really give up and join the forces of good! You're much to smart to help out... That bad guy you help.
Y-you really don't know when to quit, do you, Shego? I'm really not enjoying this game you're making the heroes play!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between The Phantom Thieves and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Team RWBY and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Overwatch and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between The Phantom Thieves and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Overwatch and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Overwatch and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Team RWBY and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Overwatch and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Team RWBY and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Don't worry, Sola, I think between Team RWBY and I, we can get you past any crisis of confidence you're having!
Spooky? Y-you’re a ghost? Tikki says hi, from one spirit to another.
I can’t tell if this is some kind of performance art…Streaming-chan…
I see London, I’ve seen France...
You say you’re not human originally…What were you?
Hmm... Where have I seen you before?
I'm not going to try to pick a fight with you, but...
You are too weird, Vriska...
What's the kwami of your dice...? I can't quite figure out the animal motif...
A-at least you're still losing, Vriska. Trust me. You'll want to get rid of that evil butterfly as soon as possible.
Trust me, Vriska. You'll want to get rid of the evil butterfly in your dice as soon as possible. Er. Not Kyu. She's kinda gross but she's nice.
Trust me, Vriska. You'll want to get rid of the evil butterfly in your dice as soon as possible. Er. Not Star though. She's not that type of butterfly.
Trust me, Vriska. You'll want to get rid of the evil butterfly in your dice as soon as possible. Er. Not Star or Kyu though. What a crossover this is turning into.
Looks like you're time's up, Vriska! It's time for you to surrender!
I'm glad this tasteless display is over. Ugh.
What is wrong with you, Vriska? How tasteless.
By my math, you should be just about done, Vriska.
Well, well, looks like someone isn't so tough after all? How's it feel to meet someone who's actually lucky, Vriska?
Please tell me you're going to dry off now. I-it's kind of hard to deal with you standing there soaked. M-my innate sense of heroism means I have to care about even you, Vriska.
Oh, you're going to undress again? Playing by the rules is so, so challenging, isn't it, Vriska?
The good news, Vriska, is that we could basically see everything so why don't you--
You know, Vriska, we've already seen your chest, so, really, you could just--
I guess she’s just less attached to her weapon, Aimee. You know, like a reasonable person.
Oh, poor little rich girl. Truly, life has made it so hard for you.
Maybe nobody has told you anything because you’re being spoiled brat, Weiss?
Uh, no, Weiss. Not quite. You’re flaunting your riches.
You know, Trainer, I’m actually in pretty good shape!
I wish my teachers were patient like you, Trainer.
I only hope your fighting style is as over-developed as the rest of you.
I have a blonde boy in a weird outfit rescue me on occasion too.
That’s a really cool hat, Zizou!
~name~? I-I wasn’t sure if you had quit and were just observing.
Wow, ~name~, you haven’t gone in a while. You’re really playing well!
Oh, is ~name~ taking off his ~clothing~?
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
Mmm... S-sorry ~name~. I just really like people with green eyes... Like Adrien... E-er, s-sorry, gack to the bame! B-back to the game!
O-oh! Those eyes remind me of-- W-well, you probably know who they remind me of, to be honest.
~name~, I get the feeling you’re used to unraveling mysteries of the supernatural variety... Like your current outfit, maybe there’s more than it seems?
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.
W-well. ~name~, you're n-not really from my normal palette when it comes to designing clothes...
Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
Huh what? Sorry, I sasn’t waring-- Wasn’t staring. Er…
I-I won't look too closely. I-it's not like you're a statue for me to study. Though... Have I seen you carved in marble somewhere?
You two are such a good team!
Not very heroic of you...
HBO? Wait, this isn’t on TV? W-wait, HBO has things like this on it?
Um. People can enjoy sex however they want, Zone-tan, but I think most people prefer not to have their wardrobes damaged in the process!
~name~’s worked really hard to get into that kind of shape. You don’t stand a chance, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is always upbeat. And I will *never* let you take that away from her.
~name~’s confidence isn’t going to be eroded by your lies, Ayano!
~name~ has killer fashion sense. Believe me. I’d know.
~name~ saves and helps lots of people regularly.
~name~ has a pure soul, and if Hawk Moth can’t touch her, neither can you!
~name~ doesn’t have a mean bone in her body. You could learn from her.
You know, Ayano does have a point, ~name~...
~name~ guides and protects her people with great skill.
~name~ has lots of witty remarks. Though she can be hard to deal with sometimes, someone with that insightful of a mind can’t fall prey to your tricks.
~name~ has her pick of the boys--or girls--and it’s because of her shining personality. If ~player~ wants her, she’d be a much better choice than an obsessive monster like you.
~name~ is already in a committed relationship, and she doesn’t need ~player~, but given how you’re acting, you definitely don’t need them either!
~name~ has a lot going for her, and she’s competitive in ways neither you nor I are. Don’t talk down to her or make her lose faith in herself!
~name~ is adored by her fans, and is used to facing danger. You better watch your threats, Ayano!
Just because ~name~ is misguided, doesn’t mean that she doesn’t have redeeming qualities. Maybe if you didn’t pick on her, she wouldn’t do what she does?
Ahh!!! Could you stop shooting like that!
It is a pretty impressive skill, at least. But please don't hurt anyone!
Er, I meant--You know, morally. Not...Mortally. Erk.
W-wait a second! Argh! You tricked me!
You tricked me! This is still really unsafe but you *tricked* me!
Oh! Is this what people mean when say they want to shoot all over me? Is this just how some people undress in those old Western movies? ?
O-Okay. I'll go ahead and hope you know how to use... Whatever skill you're using.
Don’t encourage her, Zone! You don’t have some big amorphous blob that can shield us with tentacles!
I-I mean, someone I know. She's seen so many your shoots!
But I don’t know if the turtle miraculous holder likes pizza that much... or sewers. He definitely knows a lot about Ancient China though!
It’s just ~clothing~, Ayano. I think you’re overreacting. (I’m going to keep an eye out for any butterflies, just in case... This seems bad.)
It looks like you spend just as much time playing cards as you do practicing empathy, Ayano.
So given how things are going, maybe I should kiss you for luck?
O-or if you aren’t, that’s okay too? Everyone has secrets! Love or otherwise.
W-wait, that’s the one with the possessed animatronics! I have to free Chica from the Akuma, now!
Those actually look really well made! I'm not one for armor, but it's nice to see you care about more than durability.
Wow, Corrin, those look really stylish and actually durable!
O-oh. I-is that so? Hm.
But that’s a good thing. You’re just like Chloe, and you’re so mean I can’t imagine you’d have nice powers.
Oh.
Er. We're not-- I'm not-- I mean, she's really pretty but--! I mean I would be interested
Just less dressed.
I-I mean, relationship as in friendship or rivalship?
Oh, Kyoko…
Speaking of relief, do you have another set of underwear to keep you in the game, Kyu? It’s…
I think long gloves add a touch of class.
Because you look really punk-y!
I-I’m excited to see more!
I’m glad you’re having fun!
It’s great playing with you too, Nagisa!
I never really understood the appeal of thongs.
Sandals seem… Attire appropriate.
Of course, Palutena, I’m here to win too! (And at this point it looks like we’re having more fun than worry. Palutena does these asides too, so that’s okay for me, right?)
Not that you really need me to, but I won’t let you fall under the akuma’s power!
We’re all friends and heroes here, Palutena. But hopefully you can stay in the game long enough to help me subdue Ayano!
Palutena, I know Neo is pint-sized, but we should focus on making sure we can take her down… But if you don’t want me to go easy on you...

state.i: Quelle chance! Un autre Francophile. Bon chance por Elaine et nous tous!

case.state: I'm the complete package right now, though even without my costume I'll always be Ladybug, Futaba.
O-oh. That’s. Um. Well, it’d be rude to refuse, wouldn’t it?
I-it’s a really big responsibility, Kim, I’m not sure you can just “try it on.”
W-well, at least you don't work for Hawk Moth, Morrigan. There's that at least.
Humiliate me? I may be awkward, but I try not to let it get me down. Bring it on, Morrigan!
But this is a little on the nose, don't you think, Morrigan? Either way it'll be you who'll be defeated!
Humiliate me? I may be awkward, but I try not to let it get me down. Bring it on, Morrigan!
I think you should go ahead and consider that you're only probably going to beat me by embarrassing me to death at this stage, Morrigan.
Humiliate me? I may be awkward, but I try not to let it get me down. Bring it on, Morrigan!
I don't really know who those two are, Pit, but yo-yos are very flexible! I bet I could disarm you like that!
Oh, is that a challenge, Samus? Let's see what you've got!
U-uh? Offworlder? Sei? You mean, like, space aliens? That’s… Oh my. The world is a bigger place than I’d ever imagined.
Don't assume there's going to be a next time, Zizou. But if it helps you stay focused…
This is just a secret between us. There’s lots of Marinettes in Paris, but only I’m Ladybug, okay?
Let's make sure that nobody knows that I'm the Marinette that's Ladybug, okay?
I-I'm not really sure what I should be taking off right now!
Oh, it’s part of the magic of my suit, Spider-Woman.
I really appreciate that! You’ve got pretty eyes too. Um, you know. Er. B-back to losing!
Er, actually, this suit is... Just kind of as you see it...
S-sei, can you convince Streaming-chan to turn off her camera?
Wait, two in a row? Really?!
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
W-well, even if I was ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
I really should’ve used a Lucky Charm before giving away my yo-yo.
Well, the mask doesn't exactly come off... The costume, not like... Uhm. You know.
Don't be too surprised! I have just the solution for this!
Oh, it’s part of the magic of my suit, Spider-Woman.
I really appreciate that! You’ve got pretty eyes too. Um, you know. Er. B-back to losing!
S-sei, can you convince Streaming-chan to turn off her camera?
Wait, two in a row? Really?!
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
W-well, even if I was ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
Wait, my transformation’s over already? I guess this counts for the round, doesn’t it?
Tikki, are you tired already?
Lucky cha-Oh no!
Sewing magic seems-- A-ah, hold on!
The costume is probably way stronger armor than a machine, D.Va! Though it’s fading fast now!
C-could you not, Morrigan?
But I do have a few more tricks, Samus!
Zizou! N-Nothing! D-don’t worry and definitely don't look!
I--The akuma!
In two rounds? I’m supposed to have at least five minutes! That’s not supposed to-
Just don’t tell anyone who I am, okay? And, uhm. Sat I was ripping. That I was stripping! I mean!
Erk. Tikki? This seems... Well... I guess a hero follows the rules...
Oh, it’s part of the magic of my suit, Spider-Woman.
I really appreciate that! You’ve got pretty eyes too. Um, you know. Er. B-back to losing!
S-sei, can you convince Streaming-chan to turn off her camera?
Wait, two in a row? At least I’m winning...
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better… But I guess I’m so far ahead, I really don’t mind.
W-well, even if I’m ahead, this is a bad turn of events.
W-well, even if I’m ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
A-ah, zut. And I thought I had such a good hand, too!
Wow! You all had better hands than mine...? I think I'm not doing something right...
I’m not very good with words, I’m far more interested in creating things. Maybe I can help you find something new to replace whatever you’re… Um… Stripping.
Don’t worry, ~name~, I’m sure you’ll have lots of opportunities to come--I mean to comeback!
I normally do all my designs for myself... But having a live model helps get the juices flowing. You know, of the artistic variety.
There’s nothing to be embarrassed about, ~name~.
Okay, it’s ~name~’s turn, but I still think the Dealer is the villain here...
W-well, it looks like my identity’s not so secret, so I guess it’s your turn?
I think I get the idea of the game, looks like it’s ~name~’s turn.
Samus, does your kwami, Metroid, give you some sort of X-ray vision? I feel like that would be a cool power...Because if it’s limited, you don’t use it for bad purposes!
Zizou, can you please um, not use your vision sorcery to see through people’s clothes?
You have to be working for Hawk Moth, Zone-tan. Your lust for ~name~... And everyone else is... unnatural.
Americans are always pretty brash and loud. Even when you’re getting undressed. I-It’s not a bad thing, it’s just very different!
I get the feeling you and I have some... Uhm. Privates in common. Privacy. Private secrets. Urk. You think girls are really pretty too, right?
S-so, you’ve been with men and women, I’m guessing? Based on what you’ve said? W-what is that like? It seems a little more nuanced...
N-now that I'm not in costume, I kind of feel like asking ~name~ for an autograph.
Wow, ~name~!? You're famous, right? What on Earth are you doing in a place like this?
I admire your enthusiasm, ~name~...
I have a hard time with Mandarin and Cantonese alike. Then you have Shanghaiese, Taiwanese... But I’d always love to learn more. At least French sounds pretty distinctive.
Some people are scared of clowns. I don't know why, I think they're pretty fun, to be honest!
(~name~'s a criminal, right? Should I just... Step in?)
~name~, are you... On Heronet as a wanted criminal, by any c-chance?
~name~, you're a detective, aren't you? W-well, w-what have you deduced about this game?
Hey there, ~name~, fancy a cup of tea?
Hey! You’re just from across the Channel. Let me try! “‘Ello! ‘Ello!” That was terrible, but at least it’s not “hon hon hon oui baguette baguette.”
De quelle région de France êtes-vous?
You seem like you're pretty good at games, ~name~! Any recommendations?
O-oh dear, you seem like you're pretty good at games, ~name~. Um. Try and not beat us too bad, okay?
I like your hair, it reminds me of Alya’s. It’s a super cool color!
Kwami sounds awfully close to kami, don’t you think? For spirits that inhabit objects... like... the one you’re taking off now...
~name~, you remind of me of my friend Alya, always trying the bottom of things. Er! To get to the bottom! Not butt... things…(But Alya did say…)
Erm... Do you happen to be a lawyer, ~name~? I may have some unofficial questions as Ladybug after this...
I couldn't help but notice, ~name~. I'm loving the whole magical girl theme we're working with tonight between us.
Ryuko, your act isn’t impressing anyone else either…
You seem like a jerk, ~name~.
H-hey ~name~, c-could you help me out? I feel like I'm dying... Of embarrassment!
~name~, you're a medic or a doctor, right? I want to say I really appreciate the hard work you do. That's all.
The Mushroom Kingdom? Where’s that, ~name~? It sounds magical!
I adore a good musician, ~name~.
~name~! What kind of music do you play!?
As much as Chloe acts like a princess, she’s such a brat.
You’re much much nicer than Chloe, though. Personality and appearance-wise.
I like your hair, it reminds me of Alya’s. It’s a super cool color!
You know, I've heard great things about Beacon!
I like to experiment too, ~name~! E-er, I mean...
A scientist? That's fascinating! I hope you're a, not an evil scientist.
Hey, ~name~, it’ll be okay. We’re all friends here. Mostly... .
I'm really happy to see another hero here. J-just not like this.
W-wait, are the two of you pirates? Are you the akumatized people I'm here to stop?
Aimee... I can't quite place your accent... But you sound... American?
Oh, of course you'll give up the gun first. Then you'll take off the bands one by one.
You know, without my costume, I feel a bit threatened by something that big.
I don't really like guns.
Er... I guess you didn't transform as much as shot off your clothes.
Aimee, how can you scare a sweet and innocent person like Florina? Won’t you think of her?
I-I'm a little worried about the continued gunplay, Aimee.
Aimee, this is getting really dangerous. Without clothes or armor...
Futaba, for all that’s holy, stop encouraging her!!!
Uhm. With the way things are going, I can see this getting very dangerous when you run out of clothes.
Okay. Surely you'll part with that incredibly dangerous weapon now, right?
Okay, Aimee. You're down to almost nothing. I mean, Blake was embarrassed when she had to take off her ribbon...
Aimee, even Kyoko took off her gloves before her underwear, now's the time to lose the gun, right?
Even Revy put away her guns...
I'm going to assume you'll be keeping the gun...
Aimee, I'll even help you undress if you just... stop shooting. Please. For goodness sakes.
Hmm... So you're digital? As in you aren't real?
Amalia, do you have some sort of Miraculous?
Hmm... Amalia, I have a feeling you use a Miraculous too, don't you?
You speak French too, so it's not that much of a stretch! But it's a bit of a faux pas to use your names and powers at the same time, oui?
Based on the way you're playing, Amalia...
Wait, Amy, are you using the hedgehog Miraculous?
Ohmygosh, Ann Takamaki!? The model from Japan? We have so much in common!
You definitely strike me as someone who finds a good balance between hero and renegade.
While you're here, we could stop by my parents'?
Is your hair natural? I've heard you're a quarter American, but...
You seem smart, Annie!
That sweater looks pretty comfortable. And I like the color!
Hmm… Is this to psyche us out, or to distract us?
Oh! You've been very self-conscious about this, have you been padding--
You know, April, my friend Alya also reports on animal-themed superheroes…
Arwen! You were one of my biggest heroes growing up!
You know, Arwen, I really meant it. You were a big inspiration... You come from such a diverse background...
Wow, Asuna! You have so much enchanted equipment!
Hmm... Ayano, you seem off but I can’t quite figure out why…
Okay, I think I’ve seen enough of you to be really, really worried. Ayano, try and be a healthier person, or Hawk Moth is surely going to turn you into a villain!
We should get you to a hospital, Ayano. I… Think you’re beyond my help.
Ayano, please, give up.
Ayano, do you have something against the rest of us? Your comments have been pretty mean... I don’t want you to be akumatized.
You know, Ayano, this game might be a bit stressful, but it’s supposed to be fun... I hope you can relax and be a bit less... creepy towards senpa- I mean, ~player~...
Blackrose! I don’t want you to get too upset.
I hope that wasn’t an insulting statement earlier...Red eyes and pale hair are very unusual where I’m from...
S-sorry for my earlier comment, the two of you do look kind of similar. And Rinkah’s from the Flame Tribe…
U-uhm. I think Blake is really cute b-but I think Yang is more invested. Interested. You. Uhm. Know what I mean?
O-oh! I’m a bit slow on the uptake. I’m sorry Blake, I didn’t realize you and Yang were together!
Cat Noir is always trying to kiss me, you know?
The tension between you and Yang must make for good teamwork. Believe me, I’d know.
W-well you did say you'd done this before. And you seem really worth getting to know.
Hmm... Being a Slayer sounds like you could really benefit from a Miraculous...
Er... I know your type, Chiaki. Do you get really embarrassed when you lose?
Er… Freddy Fazbear’s? I think I’ve heard of that restaurant...
H-hey! Is it actually lucky, or are you just saying that? I can show you a real lucky charm if you want.
I-I mean if giving up small stuff protects you from feeling poorly, then it definitely counts!
Corrin! I love the stories I've heard of you! You're so uplifting!
Great! I know you're quite a skilled warrior, and you definitely don't seem to be having a crisis of confidence.
Y-you know. I really hope this isn't a tactical maneuver to get at my Miraculous... Hawk Moth's tried that a few times...
Hmm... You know, I'm not an armorer... But I can see some... Stylistic... Improvements I could make.
Is all armor from... Hmm... Is it all so complicated?
For such elaborate armor and such a striking appearance, I have to say your attire... Uhm. Isn't quite as interesting.
Hm. You and Lyn both come from the same place, right? Are the Sacean Plains the fashionable part of the world?
Wow! D.Va! I’m normally a fighting game person but everyone knows who you are!
If her mech weren’t just technology, I could be convinced that D.Va is Hana’s superhero identity.
That’s clever, Daisy! Got it! So, if you get too rattled, Daisy, I’ll break your crown!
I actually think we’d have gotten along well in high school, Daria.
You’re pretty different from the others. More sarcastic than Nino, smarter than Chloe, cuter than Alyx...
You think love triangles are hard?
Wow! I love your fashion sense...
Do you... Also think girls look cute, by any chance, Dark Magician Girl?
Sorry about that Dawn, girls with blue hair need to stick together!
Ugh, puns. Always the puns.
U-uhm. I know you aren't here for the best reasons...
Elena, I get the feeling you get rushed into things a lot...
Hm... That belt is really classic! I love how it tied your outfit together.
W-who is Esteban and why would he put you up to this?
Elena! I at least joined this because I was worried about Hawk Moth... I'll take this Esteban down, I promise!
I really admire someone who can wear a skirt. I'm... really not a dress type of girl.
If it makes you feel better, I think it's a pretty skirt.
Elena, I... Uhm. Don't think it's right to abuse political power... But... You didn't really ask to be here so...
It's a bit vintage but I like the way your outfit comes together.
I think there's probably a Songbird miraculous to go with your locket! It seems like it's a good fit for you, for some reason, Elizabeth!
So you can... teleport? Are you sure you don't have some sort of guardian spirit? Wait, his name is Booker? What's a Booker?
Er... If you come to Paris I can definitely get you some new clothes as it seems like you're rubbing out.
Err... N-not really the kitty I normally work with...
You know, I bet some people get really turned on by the whole shaving thing...
I-I like your hair, Florina!
Florina… Florina… Hey, Florina… It’s your turn...
Please tell me you weren’t paying attention, and um… Weren’t fixating on Zone-tan.
Definitely not! Change is part of life, as is adventure, Florina! Don’t give up!
GoGo Tomago? Didn’t your friend just buy you equipment for your powers?
Now you’re definitely not wearing a superhero costume...
A superhero has a sense of dignity.
Whoa, Gwen, your suit? L-like, the whole thing?
So, now that you’re taking off… Um, the rest of your suit, are you going to tell me-- Er, us, the story?
U-uhm. I-if it’s for you--oooour value of the *international superhero community*...
W-well, Gwen, looks like lit’s lour… looks like it’s your… Um...
’Daddy’s Little Monster’? You are so tasteless…
Hmm, that’s really well worn! Is it an Agreste?
An athletic superhero who has to balance her academic life...With great fashion sense! You seem awfully familiar…
Wow, you really prepared to come! E-erk, came prepared!
I’m impressed by your bravery, Kim! I’m a little more conservative than that...
Cheerleader? Hmm… Oh! You’re a pom pom girl, Kim?
You and Shego really have a longstanding relationship, don't you, Kim?
The Avatar? Whoa, you’re like a Kwami of your own! It must be so cool to have the power to manipulate all of the elements!
The Water Tribe? Where is that supposed to be?
Kyoko, I like your outfit!
So, you’re actually some kind of fairy?
Okay, so no, what’s next?
Wings always seem really complicated when other heroes use them.
I’m amazed you keep those gloves so pristine! Given your, um, personality, Kyu.
Fairy powers are so weird… Are you sure you’re not a kwami of some sort?
You know, I feel like it’s a bit rude...
You know, Lilith, are the Sirens a band?
Sirens are… Kind of magical? Sort of?
Um, Lilith, I think your tattoos are really cool!
I tend to like more natural looks.
What's your kwami like, Lux? It must be nice to have so much extra armor over your suit...
That’s a nice sword, but is it a Miraculous or is it possessed by an Akuma?
That’s a nice sword, but is it a Miraculous or--Oh! I suppose if Florina knows about it, it’s definitely something like that!
Wow, where are you from?
Um. D.Va, vampires aren’t real, I don’t think. She’s clearly akumatized. And even then, she doesn’t seem hostile…
Huh? Bubblegum? Don’t you usually chew that? What does that have to do with Marceline? Does she have a rubber or bubble based akuma power?
What does a slasher even do? Reduce prices? Not that scary!
Wait, you're Mei Ling, the famous climatologist?
Mei, after this, can you tutor me in Mandarin?
Meia, your hair is so pretty! Where did you and Corrin get your hair done?
It looks like Moon isn’t possessed by an akuma… She’s just kind like this?
Wait! I remembered the magic words!
You're so eager to get naked!
E-er... Okay, so you're floating, you look like a demon, and you're getting a little... Aggressive.
Ah, don’t worry Nagisa, we’ll see this through together!
You’re worth lots, Nagisa. Don’t lose heart, everyone can enjoy time with friends!
Are you in surry to hemove your rocks? Er. A hurry to remove your socks, Nagisa?
Hmm… Tarou Urashima… That’s the story about the time traveler… But why would that make you ahead…?
No need to get worried, Nagisa! I’m right here with you. And friends make it better, right? Or...Um, more tolerable.
It’s alright, Nagisa. I can definitely tell you’re playing better than last round!
I may be out of my costume, but I’ll kick your butt if you’re mean to Nagisa, Shego!
Hmm...I don’t think anyone will laugh, Nagisa. And that’s a really clever idea!
Don’t give up Nagisa! You haven’t lost yet!
A dango bra? That would be like me wearing something with cinnamon rolls on it... Or cake?
Erk, sorry Nagisa. But at least you’re experiencing something new?
Nagisa, I can smell the bakery on you!
It’s okay Nagisa. Sometimes, the people you meet in passing, you get to know far better than you might think.
Wow Nagisa! You’re really giving it your all now, aren’t you?
I-I’d offer to let you borrow my bra, if it wasn’t against the rules, we seem like we’re the same size...
Er-Well. Um. I-
I-Um. Okay! Something!
Wait, your name is Neopolitan... like the ice cream, or the Italian area? Do you just not speak a language with us?
Oh goodness, you don’t even need an akuma, you have a really vicious aura about you…
Wait, you’re an imposter! You aren’t Neo at all!
Wait, you’re an imposter! You aren’t Neo at all!
Wait, I think I’ve seen a statue of you. Are you really Palutena?
Two goddesses? Wow, this game must be really important!
Hmm...Palutena, you’re a little bit of a trickster, aren’t you? I bet you and Tikki would get along.

Don’t worry, Palutena. Even if you do get embarrassed, I can deakumatize you really quickly. I mean, I’d have to. A god with akuma powers would be really scary...Especially someone as powerful as you!
Even if you’re a goddess, you’re still in this Palutena, and I won’t go easy on you!
Hmm... You seem a bit... unusual, Pearl.
A chiffon! I would love to talk more about that with you! Such an underused choice of garment!
I think we have a lot in common, Raven!
You know, I heard they let people bring weapons to the game… I was a bit surprised...
Er. My yo-yo is most ly used to disarm people…
Red! You’re getting really…
W-wait, it can talk? Is this like Robustus?
Wait a second, red and black together... That's why they call you a ladybug pair! Quelle chance!
Samus Aran? I’ve heard of you!
Samus, my powers are kind of similar to yours! I suit up and then have to build my own powerups each time.
I thought mercenary-types regularly played cards in seedy bars. A-are you just throwing?
I’ve never seen a military outfit like that one before, Sayla. I like it, it’s very bright! Judging by your attitude, you’re bright as well!
Um...Scarlet Witch, that outfit looks… Very… Um. Everyone can almost see your…
The good stuff? Sure! Wait, you aren’t showing the good stuff already?
Sei... Asagiri. Asthagiri? Hmm... I can't tell if that's a Japanese or Indian name.
So, you're another hero! Just... one of the drunker ones, it seems.
Uhm. Sei, you’ve never gone mad with power, right?
You know, I do have to say I really appreciate the work the police do. I don’t stop criminals of the... normal variety.
I don't really drink but... Wow, those look tasty.
Seven of Nine? I’m sorry, did something get translated wrong? Sept de Neuf? Mme. Neuf?
You sound really familiar, Shantae…
Hmm, okay, so you aren’t a swordswoman. Do you manipulate time? Maybe… You have a thing for girls with pink hair?
Oh! You worked for REVOCs, right?
Okay, I’ve heard you on TV. Are you that actually that famous japanese runner? Miki Makimura?
Agh, Shantae, I give up.
Hmm... You seem familiar...
Sheena, you're a summoner, right? Maybe you can help improve my bond with Tikki!
W-wait, you're Shego, right? Don't you willingly serve evil?
Kim Possible and Ladybug are going to take you down, Shego! No more evil-doing!
Shego, you should really give up and join the forces of good! You're much to smart to help out... That bad guy you help.
Y-you really don't know when to quit, do you, Shego? I'm really not enjoying this game you're making the heroes play!
Sola, I really like your hair! What a cool color!
I can’t tell if this is some kind of performance art…Streaming-chan...
I see London, I’ve seen France...
You say you’re not human originally…What were you?
I'll just say it, the clothes are coming off.
So Videl, it's a shame you're losing but I guess...
I guess you're not so lucky after all, Vriska!
I'm starting to think that dice of yours is definitely the host of an akuma... Master Fuu wouldn't have trusted a Miraculous to... Er... Someone like you.
I'm really starting to wonder if your dice is just an akuma target and I'm a big idiot for not noticing sooner.
A-at least you're still losing, Vriska. Trust me. You'll want to get rid of that evil butterfly as soon as possible.
Trust me, Vriska. You'll want to get rid of the evil butterfly in your dice as soon as possible. Er. Not Kyu. She's kinda gross but she's nice.
Trust me, Vriska. You'll want to get rid of the evil butterfly in your dice as soon as possible. Er. Not Star or Kyu though. What a crossover this is turning into.
Trust me, Vriska. You'll want to get rid of the evil butterfly in your dice as soon as possible. Er. Not Star though. She's not that type of butterfly.
So, are you going to stop cheating, Vriska? Maybe you'll pick something tasteful this time?
I'm glad this tasteless display is over. Ugh.
What is wrong with you, Vriska? How tasteless.
By my math, you should be just about done, Vriska.
Well, well, looks like someone isn't so tough after all? How's it feel to meet someone who's actually lucky, Vriska?
Please tell me you're going to dry off now. I-it's kind of hard to deal with you standing there soaked. M-my innate sense of heroism means I have to care about even you, Vriska.
Oh, you're going to undress again? Playing by the rules is so, so challenging, isn't it, Vriska?
The good news, Vriska, is that we could basically see everything so why don't you--
You know, Vriska, we've already seen your chest, so, really, you could just--
I guess she’s just less attached to her weapon, Aimee. You know, like a reasonable person.
No, not particularly. I think I have to just treat you with the Chloe protocol...Assume your bad behavior on its own isn’t enough stress to akumatize you…
Uh, no, Weiss. Not quite. You’re flaunting your riches.
Sorry if I was a bit rude earlier, you and Yang together capture the least favorite parts of my least favorite person.
You know, Trainer, I’m actually in pretty good shape!
I wish my teachers were patient like you, Trainer.
I only hope your fighting style is as over-developed as the rest of you.
You're not one for high fashion, are you?
I have a blonde boy in a weird outfit rescue me on occasion too.
That’s a really cool hat, Zizou!
W-whoa Ayano, that’s kind of mean.
Hey! Ayano, don’t insult her. Nobody is that mean to ~name~ to her *face* or behind her *back.*
Ayano, ~name~ has lots of redeeming qualities. And you won’t degrade her with your lying!
~name~? I-I wasn’t sure if you had quit and were just observing.
Wow, ~name~, you haven’t gone in a while. You’re really playing well!
Oh, is ~name~ taking off his ~clothing~?
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
Mmm... S-sorry ~name~. I just really like people with green eyes... Like Adrien... E-er, s-sorry, gack to the bame! B-back to the game!
O-oh! Those eyes remind me of-- W-well, you probably know who they remind me of, to be honest.
~name~, I get the feeling you’re used to unraveling mysteries of the supernatural variety... Like your current outfit, maybe there’s more than it seems?
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
