Probability control, you mean like… Really good luck? I’m happy my miraculous can alter reality, but I don’t even think it can save us from these hands...
These cards are kind of like your summoner seals, are they, Sheena? Maybe if you thought of it that way, you’d be in better shape?
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? Not like Spooky… Someone friendly, trying to do the right thing!
S-so, doesn't having hair that long get in the way of... Um. Most everything?
Hey! I love twintails. The best parts of a ponytail but with so much more customization. I'm glad I have someone else who agrees here!
I won't lie, it's nice to see someone else with a twintails style. Very cute.
I've thought about letting my hair grow long like... Hm. It's rude to name names. It would really get in my eyes, though.
I think long hair looks so feminine and classy! E-er. Emphasis on the latter.
I like that drill hairstyle, by the way! It's so cute!
Hey... Isn't keeping a drill hairstyle like that a ton of work? I could see myself going for it if I wasn't so busy all the time...
Um. I don't think I like messy hair like that. I wish I could look that good bowling out of red! R-rolling out of bed, I mean!
E-er. Sorry. I don't mean to stare, but um. Someone's hair is so... messy. It's sort of distracting!
Hmm... We have a lot of the same hairstyle here tonight... Suspicious...
Hmm... That short haircut does look pretty cute. I wonder if I'd look like that...
Oh! Your pegasus! I cannot get over how cool that is, Florina!
Let me think on this…
Hmm… This… Might be okay?
This hand should work...
Okay, but I could use a little bit of bad luck for everyone else.
Okay, Aimee, 48 specialties. Are any of them taking things seriously?
Aimee! Don’t be mean to them just because they don’t talk much. They have a voice, they just don’t express it in words.
Actually, Alpha, could you promote my friend Nino’s mixtape?
You know, I feel like more heroes should use shields, Cap. If I spin my yo-yo just right, I can use it to block attacks. I’d um. Show you, but...
I heard someone say there was something cursed? I happen to have just to have a reliable solution to that!
I’m not going to go easy. I’m here to win, but I’m also not out to shame anyone!
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
D.Va, my costume has been worn by all sorts of people over the years. I haven’t heard of Widowmaker. Is he some kind of bodysuit designer?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat? D.Va, better watch out, as she's the bunniest of all of us!
Oh! Well, that's an interesting story, Dark Magician Girl. Though I like your hair as it is now! (Even the lack thereof on your...)
Don’t worry, Florina! I may not be a tank, but I’m pretty durable and I’ll make sure you have nothing to be afraid of!
Believe in yourself, Florina! You can be brave all on your own. Be proud of your body and heart!
Don’t worry, Florina! Lyn is here, and she’ll keep you safe, even if I can’t.
Wow, Futaba, you're really attached to your headphones. Even though you're um... Losing.
Hey, Futaba, you seem really attached to those headphones. They’re very nice, but, it’s not like they’re magic, right? Do you need those to activate your Miraculous-- Erk, your Persona?
I-I… I don't--I mean, if you're offering, Futaba, you’re pretty! B-but you remind me a little too much of Alya for it not to be weird...
U-uh-um. I wouldn't sorry about--wouldnt worry about that… What about you?
(Futaba, your secret identity is Medjed, right? I'm really impressed by the good you do! It can be a little hard to cover all the white collar crime.)
E-er-- I like Gwen. Like. Um, you know, like, Gah! I’m just-- I’m… Erk.
Aww, Futaba has a boyfriend! I think? That’s adorable!
Have you heard of the Ladyblog, Futaba?
The Ladyblog gets the good parts. Mostly! About, you know, superhero stuff. (I wonder if it's me or Futaba that needs to get out more...)
Maybe I should pick up a copy of the Bugle. Or maybe you should start a blog, Gwen. I’d leave this out, though, oui?
MLB? Isn’t that like… A sport, in America? And did you just call me cute?
U-um. I guess if you can get me to lose, you’ll find out.
I’d be interested to see how you interact with reporters, Gwen!
Well, not in this universe, Gwen! Y-you can hardly blame me for, um, being imprecise. I’m sorry if I hurt your feelings!
Well, Gwen, according to *my* canon, yes! I’d love to visit it again. We could go swinging through the skyscrapers together!
Hey! English isn’t my first language. Don’t be rude… But how’d you get a d’aww reel? Erk. Raw deal?
Under where, my suit? Magic, Gwen, obviously.
Sorry, I’m a little… startled by butterflies. It’s what you might say is… An occupational hazard.

state.i: Meia? Vraiment, salope? Tu veux entrer dans ça?

case.state: Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Um. Nagisa, I hate to tell you this but after careful scrutiny there’s no odd scar there. Just a crack.
Sei, your armor looks kind of like Hawkmoth…
Wait, there’s a club for people like us? And I wasn’t invited! I’d love to be a part!
Uh, Sei, when you frame Hawk Moth that way it is really creepy…
See, Spooky? You gave me a big scare!
Y-yow did hou!? W-what the-- Vriska! Stop it!
It has to be snug, Vriska! Or else it's an impediment to mobility!
G-gah! How dare you i-imply!
Moi? Affame d'attention?! How dare you, Vriska!
Hey Kyu, do you think you'd be a good influence on Vriska? With that blue outfit of hers, I feel like she could use a fairy guide.
H-hey! There's no need to threaten me with violence because I wasn't... Er...
You know, Vriska, I did take an Alternian elective for a quarter. Maybe the nuance of French is too complex for you?
Oh trust me. I don't need to make fake sounds. Um... When speaking French. (Or elsewhere.)
Zizou… Sorry, that was brave of you, I just get freaked out by purple butterflies. For obvious reasons.
Yattane? What does that mean, Zizou?
Zone-tan, I was thinking about tentacles...I do kind of cover myself with magic armor regularly… Maybe you find tentacles a similar comfort? N-not the probing…
I don’t really understand your fixation with tentacles,Zone…
Oh wait a second, I knew I recognized your codenames! You’re those Phantom Thieves they talk about on Heronet, aren’t you!
You know something about spirits? I’d love to talk with you about the Kwami and Miraculouses!
Wow, this is almost like cheating... It’s been a long time since I even came close to losing.
Hmm... Miraculous or no, I guess I’m playing a little above average, since it’s been a while since I lost something.
You can’t chalk this up to dumb luck. Just a smart Ladybug.
Clever tricks and luck go a long way. I wonder if I can make it an even 10 turns...
I’d like ~cards~, de toi.
It’s no lucky charm, but ~cards~ might be what I need.
After that play, I want ~cards~ to be safe.
Zut.
Dealer, trare you urposelyy pull… Purposely giving me bad hands?
I’m always a bit worried about people who are so obsessed with media…Like Alya.
I wish I could just take off the mask... but, you know, magic. I’ll keep the earrings on.
Well. I'm glad I never really got into that whole "go nude under your costume" thing like Alya did.
If you thought that transformation was interesting, what if I told you that costume can adapt to its environment, too?
Tactical visor? Like your blindfold? Sorry, 9S, sometimes a mask is just a mask! When you have your wits you don’t really need elaborate user interfaces to get the job done.
E-er, I chasn't-- I wasn't cheating, Aella! I just. Erm. I came here because I thought people needed saving. I always wear clothes under my costume!
Aella! I didn't make moreclothes, I've always been dressed like this under the suit!
I know, right? If only I could replicate that without the costume...
Sorry Aimee! Style dominates low class "sexiness!"
O-oh. Well, that is one way of looking at it, Buffy.
Buffy! Magic can be very useful. Usually. Most of the time?
Thanks, Chun-Li. I'm glad you can keep that a secret. And you know, that you'd think someone like me would be interesting!
Oh! You have a technique to transform too, Corrin?
Happy you can appreciate it, Corrin! I would love to do some training with you!
Er… D.Va, it’s magic. I think I’ve mentioned that a few times.
Thanks for the offer to help, D.Va, but… Um. My bodysuit doesn’t come off like yours does. I don’t think anyway!
I bet you’re really interested in the contents of my suit, D.Va, but you’ll have to try harder than that!
V-voudou? I know they speak French in the Caribbean but I've never done black magic!
I-I mean it's not much of a secret anymore, Elizabeth! T-though I do hope I win the next hand, too.
O-oh. Nope, just a cute girl. W-wait, did you just...I...Oh my! I think you’re cute too! Er. You know, as friends. (Marinette, get a grip!)
Trickster? Tikki can be kind of minxy, but... Oh! Do you call your kwami Personas?
W-well, I wish I could constantly get new powerups like those shows, but aren't those more for boys?
Thanks, Gwen! I like to put a lot of m-myself into my style. (Pourquoi est-ce que je m’enerve tellement autour de Gwen?)
M-magic! Um. Are you *not* wearing clothes beneath your costume, Gwen? I-I mean, I’m not checking you out, I’m just a bi-curious--*A bit curious is all!*
M-magic! I see you not wearing clothes. I-I mean, I’m not checking you out, I’m just a bi-curious--*A bit curious is all!*
E-er, what were you expecting, exactly, Kyoko?
Um-- Kyoko, what exactly were you expecting of me, then?
To be fair, Kyoko... Um. I hope it's... More pleasant than what you had to reveal...
Um. I hope this was pretty distracting considering your... Condition.
Oh! Sorry Kyu. It’s just how my costume works!
Well, unlike you, my magic isn’t a slow fade like that.
Well thank you Mei! You think they'd give away my identity a bit more, but I'm happy you like that icy blue color.
That's sweet, Mei! But I bet the sky in Antarctica was a much prettier blue!
I don’t know much about what sort of heroes are from where you’re from, but yes, I’m a superhero! I protect the innocent from harm and save those who get possessed by evil.
A plug suit? Oh, of course not! It's just higher dimensional folding thanks to the alien spirit who comes around with me.
P-plug? I am a lady and I do not use plugs on my body.
Yes, this is my secret identity, Morrigan. But I'm far from being out!
Y-you promise? Well, um. Thanks for not telling anyone about this, Morrigan.
Thanks Nagisa! And yes, I can change into and out of my costume just about wherever, so I always make sure to dress well.
Aww, Nagisa, that’s so sweet. I’m really happy someone appreciates the work I put into it!
Nagisa, I came here to save people from being embarrassed. The magic is... kind of part of all that. I’m sorry.
Aww, Nagisa, that’s so sweet. I’m really happy someone appreciates the work I put into it!
It’s always nice to see things in person, rather than TV. W-well, when it’s something cool, anyway, don’t you think Nagisa?
Don’t worry Nagisa. Even if this doesn’t go your way, we can always do something a bit more wholesome after
H-ha, thanks Nagisa. I hope you mean at the transformation sequence and not the stripping.
U-uhm. Magic and careful planning, mostly, Nagisa.
Never give up Nagisa! I meant it when I said I’d protect you, after all.
Never give up Nagisa! I meant it when I said I’d protect you, after all.
Um… Sorry everyone! I promise I’m not cheating!
Sorry Nugi-chan. I'm a lady! And a lady always wears panties. Er. At least panties.
I think I'm flattered, Nugi-chan!
E-er, sorry, Nugi-chan, it’ll be at least five minutes... (And I think people would get mad if I put my costume back on.)
Do you get confused often, Palutena?
D-don't you have the ability to grant this type of magic to your followers, Palutena? Is it really that weird?
It's not a trick at all! I... Use luck and insight, Pearl!
I-I see some human social nuance is lost on you, Pearl.
Tikki gets tired if I stay in costume for too long. I had some other stuff I took care of before I got here, Pit.
Palutena, have you ever considered giving Pit a costume? I bet he'd look very handsome. (And wouldn't be at all like Cat Noir. A girl can dream, can't she?)
Depending on the circumstances, I can be a lot more than just two stages, Pit.
F-fun? L-like what, Samus?
I appreciate the compliment, Samus. Maybe you should suit back up and I'll give it a go?
Um. It’s magic, Sei. You’ll have to trust me on that.
I guess I have to hope I can make my Lucky Charm erase the footage after this…
Er, well, I guess we'll see if her video keeps, won't we, Pit?
H-hey! At least I don't dress like I'm at a sleepover, Videl!
I *like* my costume, Videl. Maybe you'll find a reason to wear one someday. I think green and orange would be a good fit.
They say imitation is the sincerest form of flattery. Thanks for paying homage to the real original, Vriska.
I haven't stolen anything from you. I've been at this for quite a while, Vriska.
They say imitation is the sincerest form of flattery. Thanks for paying homage to the real original, Vriska.
Impressive talk, for someone who's already copied me.
I know someone else who puts up a big tough act to hide her feelings.
I think my costume is better for training, and it reduces how much pain I feel. I hope I'm still up to your fitness standards, Trainer!
Whew. It's always a relief to be out of my costume.
I can only stay transformed for so long… Tikki gets a little tired. She'll be fine soon, but I don't think people would be happy with me putting my suit back on.
Mine are NOT demonic!
I-I don’t think anyone wants demonic powers here. I *fight* akuma, after all.
Hm. Well. Shoes it is, then.
I have a few pairs of these flats. Just... In case there's a mess.
It’s like when I’m powered up. The costume’s not exactly got the best arch support.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Ann.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Um. No, Blake, I wasn’t looking at you. Any more than I might usually.
I actually have a friend from Luxembourg. While she does do outrageous things, she does not strip her underwear first, Daria.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Futaba.
Aw, Saki! Of course! I tend to keep my makeup really simple though. You have such soulful eyes, it should be easy to show you a few tricks!
W-well, I-I can't really dispute that. I'm a bit busy right now!
W-well, I san't way why'm not-- I can't say I'm n-not flattered!
Wait, two in a row? Really?!
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better…
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
W-well, even if I was ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
I really should’ve worn socks today.
Of all the days not to wear socks...
Even if it'd be helpful here, I'd rather not be one of those girls who uses tons of accessories. Not tasteful.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Ann.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Um. No, Blake, I wasn’t looking at you. Any more than I might usually.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Futaba.
Wait, two in a row? Really?!
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better…
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
W-well, even if I was ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
Well, here you go?
Don't get too excited, those aren't anything special. Uhm. Please don't, you know, get excited at all.
Is there someone I should put these on? I mean, somewhere. Erk.
My Miraculous takes care of most of the hard work, but I always like to be dressed nicely under it, D.Va.
Oh, oui? Avec quoi travaillez-vous habiteuellement? Oh, sorry. I’m used to French with the others on my team…What are you used to?
To be honest, it is kind of weird to get called Ladybug out of costume. Thanks for being considerate, Morrigan.
Gwen, oui? Avec quoi travaillez-vous habiteuellement? Oh, sorry, Pit I was just flir-- Answering Gwen's questions! As one superhero to another!
C-could you not, Pit? This is embarassing!
The only lesson I'm learning is that you're a sore winner, Vriska.
There's no need to be so rude, Vriska. Considering you're the one who's ripping off other people's outfits.
I'm sorry Ms. Literally teleports outfits onto herself or whatever you're doing.
You know, Vriska, you copied my costume way before I got to this point.
If I want to show off a dozen outfits in a single game I'm attending to help people, by using magic, I'll tell you, Vriska.
Elle copie mes pouvoirs et provoquemoi? Quelle merde!
Er. My costume, and my jacket? You really play for keeps, guys. And girls. Who are staring at me. I really need to break this streak...
Um. At least you didn’t get my yo-yo, costume, and jacket in one streak. I think that’s just...weirdly bad luck on my part.
I don’t really need to run away, with how challenging this is... not... So you can have my shoes.
Well, it doesn't look like I'll need to dodge or run, so I'll give up my shoes.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Ann.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Um. No, Blake, I wasn’t looking at you. Any more than I might usually.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Futaba.
Wait, two in a row? At least I’m winning...
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better… But I guess I’m so far ahead, I really don’t mind.
W-well, even if I’m ahead, this is a bad turn of events.
W-well, even if I’m ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
A-ah, zut. And I thought I had such a good hand, too!
Wow! You all had better hands than mine...? I think I'm not doing something right...
Don’t worry, ~name~, I’m sure you’ll have lots of opportunities to come--I mean to comeback!
I normally do all my designs for myself... But having a live model helps get the juices flowing. You know, of the artistic variety.
There’s nothing to be embarrassed about, ~name~.
Okay, it’s ~name~’s turn, but I still think the Dealer is the villain here...
W-well, it looks like my identity’s not so secret, so I guess it’s your turn?
I think I get the idea of the game, looks like it’s ~name~’s turn.
Samus, does your kwami, Metroid, give you some sort of X-ray vision? I feel like that would be a cool power...Because if it’s limited, you don’t use it for bad purposes!
Zizou, can you please um, not use your vision sorcery to see through people’s clothes?
You have to be working for Hawk Moth, Zone-tan. Your lust for ~name~... And everyone else is... unnatural.
Americans are always pretty brash and loud. Even when you’re getting undressed. I-It’s not a bad thing, it’s just very different!
I get the feeling you and I have some... Uhm. Privates in common. Privacy. Private secrets. Urk. You think girls are really pretty too, right?
S-so, you’ve been with men and women, I’m guessing? Based on what you’ve said? W-what is that like? It seems a little more nuanced...
I admire your enthusiasm, ~name~...
I have a hard time with Mandarin and Cantonese alike. Then you have Shanghaiese, Taiwanese... But I’d always love to learn more. At least French sounds pretty distinctive.
Hey there, ~name~, fancy a cup of tea?
Hey! You’re just from across the Channel. Let me try! “‘Ello! ‘Ello!” That was terrible, but at least it’s not “hon hon hon oui baguette baguette.”
De quelle région de France êtes-vous?
I like your hair, it reminds me of Alya’s. It’s a super cool color!
Kwami sounds awfully close to kami, don’t you think? For spirits that inhabit objects... like... the one you’re taking off now...
~name~, you remind of me of my friend Alya, always trying the bottom of things. Er! To get to the bottom! Not butt... things…(But Alya did say…)
Ryuko, your act isn’t impressing anyone else either…
You seem like a jerk, ~name~.
The Mushroom Kingdom? Where’s that, ~name~? It sounds magical!
As much as Chloe acts like a princess, she’s such a brat.
You’re much much nicer than Chloe, though. Personality and appearance-wise.
I like your hair, it reminds me of Alya’s. It’s a super cool color!
You know, I've heard great things about Beacon!
W-wait, are the two of you pirates? Are you the akumatized people I'm here to stop?
Aimee... I can't quite place your accent... But you sound... American?
Oh, of course you'll give up the gun first. Then you'll take off the bands one by one.
You know, without my costume, I feel a bit threatened by something that big.
I don't really like guns.
Er... I guess you didn't transform as much as shot off your clothes.
Aimee, how can you scare a sweet and innocent person like Florina? Won’t you think of her?
I-I'm a little worried about the continued gunplay, Aimee.
Aimee, this is getting really dangerous. Without clothes or armor...
Futaba, for all that’s holy, stop encouraging her!!!
Uhm. With the way things are going, I can see this getting very dangerous when you run out of clothes.
Okay. Surely you'll part with that incredibly dangerous weapon now, right?
Okay, Aimee. You're down to almost nothing. I mean, Blake was embarrassed when she had to take off her ribbon...
Aimee, even Kyoko took off her gloves before her underwear, now's the time to lose the gun, right?
Even Revy put away her guns...
I'm going to assume you'll be keeping the gun...
Aimee, I'll even help you undress if you just... stop shooting. Please. For goodness sakes.
Hmm... So you're digital? As in you aren't real?
Amalia, do you have some sort of Miraculous?
Hmm... Amalia, I have a feeling you use a Miraculous too, don't you?
You speak French too, so it's not that much of a stretch! But it's a bit of a faux pas to use your names and powers at the same time, oui?
Based on the way you're playing, Amalia...
Wait, Amy, are you using the hedgehog Miraculous?
Ohmygosh, Ann Takamaki!? The model from Japan? We have so much in common!
You definitely strike me as someone who finds a good balance between hero and renegade.
While you're here, we could stop by my parents'?
Is your hair natural? I've heard you're a quarter American, but...
You seem smart, Annie!
That sweater looks pretty comfortable. And I like the color!
Hmm… Is this to psyche us out, or to distract us?
Oh! You've been very self-conscious about this, have you been padding--
You know, April, my friend Alya also reports on animal-themed superheroes…
Arwen! You were one of my biggest heroes growing up!
You know, Arwen, I really meant it. You were a big inspiration... You come from such a diverse background...
Wow, Asuna! You have so much enchanted equipment!
Hmm... Ayano, you seem off but I can’t quite figure out why…
Okay, I think I’ve seen enough of you to be really, really worried. Ayano, try and be a healthier person, or Hawk Moth is surely going to turn you into a villain!
We should get you to a hospital, Ayano. I… Think you’re beyond my help.
Ayano, please, give up.
Ayano, do you have something against the rest of us? Your comments have been pretty mean... I don’t want you to be akumatized.
You know, Ayano, this game might be a bit stressful, but it’s supposed to be fun... I hope you can relax and be a bit less... creepy towards senpa- I mean, ~player~...
Blackrose! I don’t want you to get too upset.
I hope that wasn’t an insulting statement earlier...Red eyes and pale hair are very unusual where I’m from...
S-sorry for my earlier comment, the two of you do look kind of similar. And Rinkah’s from the Flame Tribe…
U-uhm. I think Blake is really cute b-but I think Yang is more invested. Interested. You. Uhm. Know what I mean?
O-oh! I’m a bit slow on the uptake. I’m sorry Blake, I didn’t realize you and Yang were together!
Cat Noir is always trying to kiss me, you know?
The tension between you and Yang must make for good teamwork. Believe me, I’d know.
W-well you did say you'd done this before. And you seem really worth getting to know.
Hmm... Being a Slayer sounds like you could really benefit from a Miraculous...
Er... I know your type, Chiaki. Do you get really embarrassed when you lose?
Er… Freddy Fazbear’s? I think I’ve heard of that restaurant...
H-hey! Is it actually lucky, or are you just saying that? I can show you a real lucky charm if you want.
I-I mean if giving up small stuff protects you from feeling poorly, then it definitely counts!
Corrin! I love the stories I've heard of you! You're so uplifting!
Great! I know you're quite a skilled warrior, and you definitely don't seem to be having a crisis of confidence.
Y-you know. I really hope this isn't a tactical maneuver to get at my Miraculous... Hawk Moth's tried that a few times...
Hmm... You know, I'm not an armorer... But I can see some... Stylistic... Improvements I could make.
Is all armor from... Hmm... Is it all so complicated?
For such elaborate armor and such a striking appearance, I have to say your attire... Uhm. Isn't quite as interesting.
Hm. You and Lyn both come from the same place, right? Are the Sacean Plains the fashionable part of the world?
Wow! D.Va! I’m normally a fighting game person but everyone knows who you are!
If her mech weren’t just technology, I could be convinced that D.Va is Hana’s superhero identity.
That’s clever, Daisy! Got it! So, if you get too rattled, Daisy, I’ll break your crown!
I actually think we’d have gotten along well in high school, Daria.

It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, D.Va?
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, Samus?
Whoa, your body suit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...But regeneration sounds great!
guess my Japanese is worse than I thought… Hmm… I thought I’d get along really well with her…
Ghosts don’t usually wear a lot of clothes… W-wait, that’s not just… part…
You can't rely on a superhero to come save you.
A ladybug can't change her spots, but maybe you can, Vriska.
I hope whatever you picked next is a bit more unique to you instead of trying to mock me.
I still haven't forgiven you, you know. You've been really rude all game.
Maybe this next set'll be a bit humbling for you.
But nothing like you.
Or as flexible, because I usually take my time in the mornings. To, um, get to classes and such.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
~name~ has really pretty eyes, and a good sense of herself.
I guess it is a bit warm in here... But that’s no reason for any of us to get hot under the collar.
You know, sometimes I do wonder what it'd have been like to have a more typical hair color...
Oh! I love hair like yours, ~name~. Black never goes out of style!
I wonder if blondes do have more fun.
You picked a really cute ~clothing~ to go with the brightness of your hair, ~name~!
Huh. You know. Is there a term for people like us? With blue hair? Blunette sounds kinda...
Wow! I'm always happy to see other people with blue hair! Really! E-er! Just maybe not in a game like this!
I get a little jealous about brown hair like ~name~'s. It's just so timeless!
A nice thing about being a brunette must be that you call pull off just about any outfit like your ~clothing~, right, ~name~?
Wow! So, I mean, I could um. Just stutted. Stutter! About your ~clothing~! But your hair is so impressive, ~name~!
O-oh! Zut! ~name~! Your hair looks beautiful when it's coordinated with your ~clothing~!
By the way, ~name~, I wanted you to know I really like your hair! It reminds me of Alya! A-and in a game like this, that's certainly a comfort.
Don't let anyone ever make fun of you for your hair, ~name~! Your soul has to burn as brightly as your locks! E-er. Sorry, that sounds really deep.
Green hair? Hmm... Is that natural, or did you just go swimming, ~name~?
Pink hair? Oh! Just like Alyx! I hope you're just as quick on your feet, ~name~!
Pink hair is pretty unusual. Unlike the really common blue variety. You should feel special, ~name~!
Purple hair? Even Juleka's hair is naturally black...
Couldn't you have settled for blue?
Purple hair? Even Juleka's hair is naturally black...
Couldn't you have settled for blue?
If you ever wanted to dye it, I bet you could do such cool colors, ~name~!
Wow! Your hair's so... So lovely! It's like fresh snow, ~name~!
And costume for… Oh.
I can call you that, right? Now that we’re both unmasked?
The rest of you looks much better. Um. Especially the... Not clothes parts.
Yeah, sandals are a bit... Um. (How do I say they're not attractive without being really mean?)
Wait, ~name~, why do I get the feeling like... I was part of that fantasy for you?
U-um. I think ~name~ is definitely finished. And besides, isn’t...Cum...I mean um! That’s the point!
Florina, are you… Interested in ~name~?
Comment impoli d’associer un point culminant a la mort, Spooky.
Goddess or no, I see you have a wide variety of skills, Zizou.
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me. You're safe now, go on home… Um, when the game’s over.
Oh no! Aimee!? A-are you okay?
Okay. She’s done, but just because she’s naked doesn’t mean we can trust her.
You did great, Florina! You should be proud for keeping up your resolve, and for singing such a cool song!
No more masturbating for you, a-kyu-ma. I definitely won’t forget about what Kyu did tonight, Kyu.
About taste... I wonder if you’d be like freshly cut grass, given... everything you’ve shown and talked about.
That play was… Adorable! Nagisa, but you don’t need to be so embarrassed by what everyone does! Even... me!
You know, mecha were always fascinating to me. That’s by far the most erotic way it’s ever been explained to me!
Wait! You're Sharla! Oh goodness. I'm so sorry it took so long to remember.
E-er. This is kinda a lot more wet than when you were in your swimsuit, Vriska... I feel a little bad. Well, a little.
Time to de-evilize! Oh no, I don’t have my yoyo! Wait a minute… Oh... It was just Zizou’s magic.
Nothing to be ashamed of... You for being undressed, me for... watching out for you.
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.
W-well. ~name~, you're n-not really from my normal palette when it comes to designing clothes...
Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
I-
Again!?
I guess you could say you missed the forest for the leaves!
Is... IS THAT BLOOD?
That’s blood, isn’t it? Possessed or not, you need to be stopped, Ayano! You’re insane! I won’t let you win!
Try having two identities and a bunch of friends with crushes on each other.
H-hey! Sait a wecond! W-wait a second! Were you naked this whole time!?
H-hold on there, Felicia! W-what are you--?
Oh, so there’s a good twist, right--
What’s the sitch Kim? Just comparing catchphrases!
Don’t bug out, Kim...Just compare our catchphrases!
I mean, because that’s how I activate and deactivate my costume…
Did someone shame you for your body? Is that why you're like this?
Moon, we can already see...
Wow, your uniform is surprisingly… Compressive. I-Impressive?
W-wait a second!
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
Oh! I do. Your breasts are--
I’m sorry, it seems you… Um, have gotten rather naked.
Shazza, you're a lot bigger in person than I expected! I just hadn't gotten the chance to say it.
Surrender, Shego! The two of us have you cornered! Give up!
Hmm... That's an interesting trick, Twilight. I'm glad you're staying modest!
Hmm... I wonder if Buffy taught you that, or if she's just a really fast learner...

(I know what it's like to have a bunch of magic you aren't sure what to do with... I should try and be a little nicer, if just to make her lower her guard so I can break that die of hers and release the akuma.)
(She puts up a tough act. But she's probably just scared and really insecure... I can't even tell if she's akumatized. I mostly just... Feel bad for her. I should be a little nicer.)
L-look at ~name~ go. I admire that self-familiarity.
You know, ~name~, I’m really interested to see what else you’re hiding.
W-what? You can fly on a pegasus! That’s incredible, Florina! A-and sorry, ~name~, about your ~clothing~. And spine.
Whoa, Sonya. That's... Wow, body paint. I didn't think I was into this. I guess I am, though.
Zoey, what do you mean by rodeo?
Shimmy? Oh! That’s a fun word to say! Shimmy...Shimmy...Shimmy...Erk. Sorry, ~name~, I got distracted...
I’m sure, even faced with a tentacle monster, ~name~ would hold her ground, Zone! No wardrobe destruction. Or. Um. Destruction of orifices.
Please don’t tell Alya about this, if you’re borrowing it from her.
Not that you need any help with that. I mean, temperature-wise.
Erm, Aimee... This seems very, very dangerous. And if a hero is telling you that...
At very least, I don't have to worry about you as a villain... You seem to only hit yourself...
Don’t worry, Florina! I’m sure Huey was safely out of range!
A-Aimee, I'd use my Lucky Charm to reverse time if you made a mistake, but there's no akumas here for me to use it on...
A-Aimee, I might die of embarrassment, but if you do that wrong, you'll actually die!
Aimee! You sure aren’t making sounds like that was a sure shot! Be careful!
Erm. If you do though, could you please *not* bring it here?
Hmm... Maybe now's not a great time, but could you do... Fashion Victim by Green Day?
Alpha, I know you're digital but... You're pretty and definitely express your personality well. That's all you.
Wow! Those are cool tattoos, Blackrose!
U-um, those are tattoos, right? Those wavy things, and not scars? R-right?
H-hey Aimee! I-I just work with someone that's just as cute--I mean looks like her!
O-oh. Well, this is embarrassing. I’m not really used to… Um… A scenario where something like you wasn’t just possessed.
Well, I guess Alpha is an AI that’s not possessed… I think. I’m keeping an eye on you, Chica.
I really think well-made armor can keep you really mobile, right? Maybe just not as mobile as me.
I'm really not one for armor, but my suit does really increase my pain tolerance and agility.
I'd say you're finally coming out of your shell, Corrin, but you definitely seem fine with this.
(She looks kind of like a frillier, female Adrien... Hmm...)
I think most people know a breastplate is also a chestplate. Don’t get so worried, Florina!
Aww! You two are so sweet on each other!
I understand how you feel, Florina, but nothing’s wrong. You’re doing great!
That sounds really embarrassing... Is that why you're so... O-oh. N-nevermind.
W-wait a second, t-that's-- That's so vulgar, GoGo!
Well! I applaud you being so clever! I’m definitely not sure what it would be like to take mine off piecemeal like that.
Futaba, I mean… I'm still interested in men but Gwen’s… Impressive in her own right...
It's not like I haven't had a similar bond with some of the villains I've fought...
I’m so sorry. I wish my Lucky Charm could heal those. You’re still an amazing detective, I can tell even from this game…
Um. Are your wings sensitive, Kyu?
Um, what about your mouth? It’s very cute but I’d rather the only dirty parts be your language.
N-no?
J-just because I don’t get a lot of chances to look at body art. But even without the art you’re really… You know…
O-oh. I guess it didn’t work… Maybe she meant Thoth, like that Egyptian god the Pharaoh channeled?
W-w-wait!? Where'd all the bats come from!?

I-I do mean sandals. M-meaning sandals are fine for the beach and your clothes, I just don’t like them. I-I’m not looking at your… Butt.

Palutena, I do have to wonder what a goddess looks like under her um...last lines of defense.
And you certainly seem enchanting! I guess if you're not akumatized, you're alright by me!

I could tie her up with my yo-yo but I think she’d like that far too much...
I mean, you’re an attractive woman taking off her clothes… Wait, did you mean… Your feet?

Bye-bye little butterfly.
Um. Aella, I feel like we're due for a random encounter soon. It looks like it's going to be a big one...
S-surely you're hiding something else in your ~clothing~, ~name~! T-this is a joke, right?
W-well, don't you look aroused at the prospect of getting naked in front of strangers...
Bye bye... um... little butterfly?
Way to keep your composure, ~name~! It's still so compact!
I’d let him storm my Normandy.
You say this Camilla is your wife? She must be a very patient woman!
Um! I'll-- Um! I-I'm actually really excited to see this.
Show me what you have, hero.
O-oh. Oh no, I have very much misinterpreted this relationship. I am so sorry.
I guess you could call this hand miraculous.
Oh no, this isn’t… Oh wait, that’s a 9, not a six! This is great!
Whoa Ms. Hedgehog, think before you draw!
Hey pretty kitty, look before you leap!
Um...What’s a PTR, D.Va? Is that some special Overwatch training?
Sorry, what were you saying about cheating? You’ve been like that for way too many hands, D.Va…
I don’t cheat! I’m just innately lucky. You’re one to talk, Ms. No-Miraculous-But Miraculously-Good-At-Games!
What? Queen Bee? Already? Where?
Um...Sorry… Queen Bee is a… Frenemy? I don’t think you’d know her, Florina.
Huey? Who is Huey?
Korra, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman? Can you use your spirit powers to talk to her?
Marceline, I’m sorry. I guess I know how must feel to be hunted, when all you’re trying to do is be a good person. And you are a good person. And I’m sorry for being...persistent.
Um, Meia, I was thinking about what you said... Earlier. Earth has lots of ladybugs! It’s what inspired my costume!
Birth control? Oh, um. Not that I-I really need it that much, but when I do, I make sure sure that appropriate measures are in place so I can feel my partner’s skin on mine.
Hmm...Have you heard of a Nue, Nagisa? I feel like it’d be a cool subject for a play! Kwami are kind of similar!
Nagisa, I don’t want to look for too long but it seems like you have a normal... butt... to me.
W-wait, this is your first time? Looks like we have even more in common than I thought, Nagisa!
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? I hear those types of stories are really popular, especially if the ghost is trying to help the living be happy!
Tikki, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman…
Hm. Nagisa, I don’t mean to frighten you, but do you know someone named Fuko-chan?
You know, Nagisa, if you were going to have a Miraculous, I have a feeling a Starfish might work really well for you!
W-wait, you’re not real, Nugi-chan? You’re an AI like Alpha?
Palutena, you’ve got me thinking that Tikki is a bit more powerful than you let on. You supply your champions with all kinds of...lucky charms, don’t you?
Clothes aren’t evil, Ryuko! Your taste could use some work though.
Probability control, you mean like… Really good luck? I’m happy my miraculous can alter reality, but I don’t even think it can save us from these hands...
Oh no, little dingo, watch your cards carefully!
These cards are kind of like your summoner seals, are they, Sheena? Maybe if you thought of it that way, you’d be in better shape?
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? Not like Spooky… Someone friendly, trying to do the right thing!
I can’t imagine not being able to run and jump... Being of frail health just means you have to have a lot of inner strength too right?
Oh! Your pegasus! I cannot get over how cool that is, Florina!
Hmm... This isn’t really what I’d like.
I may not have my miraculous, but I have this hand! Which is great! Really!
Oh, I can use this!
Okay! Looks like I’m keeping my pants on! Er… Everything before that too!
Okay, Aimee, 48 specialties. Are any of them taking things seriously?
Aimee! Don’t be mean to them just because they don’t talk much. They have a voice, they just don’t express it in words.
Actually, Alpha, could you promote my friend Nino’s mixtape?
You know, I feel like more heroes should use shields, Cap. If I spin my yo-yo just right, I can use it to block attacks. I’d um. Show you, but...
I heard someone say there was something cursed? I happen to have just to have a reliable solution to that!
I’m not going to go easy. I’m here to win, but I’m also not out to shame anyone!
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
D.Va, my costume has been worn by all sorts of people over the years. I haven’t heard of Widowmaker. Is he some kind of bodysuit designer?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat? D.Va, better watch out, as she's the bunniest of all of us!
Oh! Well, that's an interesting story, Dark Magician Girl. Though I like your hair as it is now! (Even the lack thereof on your...)
Don’t worry, Florina! I may not be a tank, but I’m pretty durable and I’ll make sure you have nothing to be afraid of!
Believe in yourself, Florina! You can be brave all on your own. Be proud of your body and heart!
Don’t worry, Florina! Lyn is here, and she’ll keep you safe, even if I can’t.
Wow, Futaba, you're really attached to your headphones. Even though you're um... Losing.
Hey, Futaba, you seem really attached to those headphones. They’re very nice, but, it’s not like they’re magic, right? Do you need those to activate your Miraculous-- Erk, your Persona?
I-I… I don't--I mean, if you're offering, Futaba, you’re pretty! B-but you remind me a little too much of Alya for it not to be weird...
U-uh-um. I wouldn't sorry about--wouldnt worry about that… What about you?
(Futaba, your secret identity is Medjed, right? I'm really impressed by the good you do! It can be a little hard to cover all the white collar crime.)
We both go with what works, I think. I bet we’d have a lot of fun finding you new clothes, Futaba! I can be punky too!
E-er-- I like Gwen. Like. Um, you know, like, Gah! I’m just-- I’m… Erk.
Aww, Futaba has a boyfriend! I think? That’s adorable!
Have you heard of the Ladyblog, Futaba?
The Ladyblog gets the good parts. Mostly! About, you know, superhero stuff. (I wonder if it's me or Futaba that needs to get out more...)
Maybe I should pick up a copy of the Bugle. Or maybe you should start a blog, Gwen. I’d leave this out, though, oui?
MLB? Isn’t that like… A sport, in America? And did you just call me cute?
U-um. I guess if you can get me to lose, you’ll find out.
I’d be interested to see how you interact with reporters, Gwen!
Well, not in this universe, Gwen! Y-you can hardly blame me for, um, being imprecise. I’m sorry if I hurt your feelings!
Well, Gwen, according to *my* canon, yes! I’d love to visit it again. We could go swinging through the skyscrapers together!
Hey! English isn’t my first language. Don’t be rude… But how’d you get a d’aww reel? Erk. Raw deal?
Under where, my suit? Magic, Gwen, obviously.
Gwen, do you *like* it when I speak to you in French?
Sorry, I’m a little… startled by butterflies. It’s what you might say is… An occupational hazard.

state.i: Meia? Vraiment, salope? Tu veux entrer dans ça?

case.state: Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Um. Nagisa, I hate to tell you this but after careful scrutiny there’s no odd scar there. Just a crack.
Sei, your armor looks kind of like Hawkmoth…
Wait, there’s a club for people like us? And I wasn’t invited! I’d love to be a part!
Uh, Sei, when you frame Hawk Moth that way it is really creepy…
See, Spooky? You gave me a big scare!
Y-yow did hou!? W-what the-- Vriska! Stop it!
It has to be snug, Vriska! Or else it's an impediment to mobility!
G-gah! How dare you i-imply!
Moi? Affame d'attention?! How dare you, Vriska!
Hey Kyu, do you think you'd be a good influence on Vriska? With that blue outfit of hers, I feel like she could use a fairy guide.
I can't really tell if you're flirting with me or threatening me, Vriska, and the lack of distinction on that is pretty disturbing.
Um. I think you're t-trying to flirt with me, r-right? O-otherwise I might be a little... Um... I'm so confused...
By the way... Gwen, can you make sounds like Vriska's doing with your mouth? I'm not going to lie, Vriska's way more impressive with her mouth-- I mean vocally! Than I am!
You know, Vriska, I did take an Alternian elective for a quarter. Maybe the nuance of French is too complex for you?
Oh trust me. I don't need to make fake sounds. Um... When speaking French. (Or elsewhere.)
Zizou… Sorry, that was brave of you, I just get freaked out by purple butterflies. For obvious reasons.
Yattane? What does that mean, Zizou?
Zone-tan, I was thinking about tentacles...I do kind of cover myself with magic armor regularly… Maybe you find tentacles a similar comfort? N-not the probing…
I don’t really understand your fixation with tentacles,Zone…
Oh wait a second, I knew I recognized your codenames! You’re those Phantom Thieves they talk about on Heronet, aren’t you!
You know something about spirits? I’d love to talk with you about the Kwami and Miraculouses!
Wow, this is almost like cheating... It’s been a long time since I even came close to losing.
Hmm... Miraculous or no, I guess I’m playing a little above average, since it’s been a while since I lost something.
You can’t chalk this up to dumb luck. Just a smart Ladybug.
Clever tricks and luck go a long way. I wonder if I can make it an even 10 turns...
I’d like ~cards~, de toi.
It’s no lucky charm, but ~cards~ might be what I need.
After that play, I want ~cards~ to be safe.
Ladybug just saved Paris, but who is going to help Marinette with this hand?
Uh, I think I have to get up to help my dad bake, and should really be going!
You know, I’m only *pretty* sure I can’t be akumatized, and this is going into some embarrassing territory...
So wait, how does this "force" of yours, work, Mara Jade? I'm not particularly religious but it seems to help you out quite a bit...
Hopefully my luck changes soon.
Well, it's nice to flex my toes.
Wait, what happens if I run out of... clothes?

Uh, 9S, I’m not exactly stupid, but you’re being really vague for someone who’s supposed to clarify data. I’m curious to understand what you mean though. (And something distracting would certainly be nice about now.)
I hadn’t thought of it that way, but that seems about right, Hana. Sometimes a purse just isn’t enough space, you know?
You seem really invested in the theory I’m usually naked under my suit, D.Va. Are you? U-um, for curious minds?
Oh! Inari! Yusuke Kitagawa is a huge inspiration. His portraits are so surreal! He must be super nice in Person!
Uhm, Gwen? Are you okay? You look...startled.
Pfft. What were you expecting, honestly, Morrigan?
Seriously? Were you expecting that I was just going to take off my pants without shoes first?
Aww, Pit. You don't need to feel left out! You already have someone beautiful in your life, don't you?
(Pourriez-vous putain pais, Pit?)
I think I'd look to see who's had to use her magic more to see who's in need of a lesson in restraint, Vriska.
Oh, I'm cheating when you've copied my outfit? When you've lost more hands? I must be cheating a lot, huh?
You're so bent out of shape over this, Vriska.
I'm not a cheater. I can play by the rules, Vriska. That's more than I think can be said about you.
Alya says Adrien really likes my jacket. That’s why I wear it like, all the time.
Well... I guess jacket is next.
Fine. I mean, everyone else is doing about the same. It's not like anyone can see anything.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Ann.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Um. No, Blake, I wasn’t looking at you. Any more than I might usually.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Futaba.

Wait, two in a row? Really?!
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better…
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
W-well, even if I was ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
But I already took off a costume and a mask!
R-really?
I thought I was better at this.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Ann.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Um. No, Blake, I wasn’t looking at you. Any more than I might usually.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Futaba.
Wait, two in a row? Really?!
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better…
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
W-well, even if I was ahead, this is a *Miraculously* bad turn of events.
So much and so fast...Normally I don't even undress this quickly for...um...You know.
W-wait, this can’t be right, I’ve… Just gone twice… But a third time? This isn’t a charm! This isn’t a charm at all!
I mean... I guess it’s only fair... Given how much everyone else is showing off.
Please fon't gluids on... Don't get fluids on my jacket! Please!
I got this as a gift, so uhm. You know, keat it trindly. Treat it kindly.
You don’t need to be a jerk about it… But yes, that’s about right!
I don’t know, D.Va. It usually works in strange ways, but I take a lot of comfort in variety!

E-er, I'm definitely not into the whole maid thing, so I'm hoping whatever comes next is... A bit better.
At least you finally settled on some casualwear... Why are you transforming again?

So, what'll it be this time, Vriska? Some sort of "wandering martial artist" look?

Not all wealth is material, Weiss.
Blake, is Weiss always this… Bourgeois?
Yang, is Weiss always like this… Repugnant?
Yang, is Weiss always this… Yawn-inducing?

And your hair does look pretty! It’s a very cool texture and color.
~clothing~... Hm... Are those markings Agreste? A Revocs or Ray=Out maybe?
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.

Thanks Mei! I would love to play with you again!
Oh! U-um. Merci, Nugi-chan?
Well, sorry everyone. But I’m going to use Lucky Charm to erase Streaming-chan’s footage. At least you’ll have something for lonely nights.
Hey, ~name~, are you sure you want to take that off?
I gave up my favorite jacket. Your ~clothing~ isn’t even designer!
~name~’s worked really hard to get into that kind of shape. You don’t stand a chance, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is always upbeat. And I will *never* let you take that away from her.
~name~’s confidence isn’t going to be eroded by your lies, Ayano!
~name~ has killer fashion sense. Believe me. I’d know.
~name~ saves and helps lots of people regularly.
~name~ has a pure soul, and if Hawk Moth can’t touch her, neither can you!
~name~ doesn’t have a mean bone in her body. You could learn from her.
You know, Ayano does have a point, ~name~...
B-bad girl...Florina, u-uhm. Can you say that again? For posteriors? I mean, posterity?
~name~ guides and protects her people with great skill.
~name~ has lots of witty remarks. Though she can be hard to deal with sometimes, someone with that insightful of a mind can’t fall prey to your tricks.
~name~ has her pick of the boys--or girls--and it’s because of her shining personality. If ~player~ wants her, she’d be a much better choice than an obsessive monster like you.
~name~ is already in a committed relationship, and she doesn’t need ~player~, but given how you’re acting, you definitely don’t need them either!
~name~ has a lot going for her, and she’s competitive in ways neither you nor I are. Don’t talk down to her or make her lose faith in herself!
~name~ is adored by her fans, and is used to facing danger. You better watch your threats, Ayano!
Just because ~name~ is misguided, doesn’t mean that she doesn’t have redeeming qualities. Maybe if you didn’t pick on her, she wouldn’t do what she does?
Ahh!!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
Your taste is very vintage, and very eclectic.
Like... I think you'd look great in a red jumpsuit!
Wait, you’re taking your skirt off first?
Those are… Impressive!
Um… It’s a very haute chic look, April! But yes, we can… See what you’re wearing underneath.
E-even though you're losing your dress, I want you to stay proud, because I know what it's like to have two very different parents, and to meet so many... interesting people.
Er... Had. It's weird you haven't found a kwami for yourself...
E-er, don’t get down Ayano, it’s... Just a game.
Based on how you’ve acted towards everyone else, I kind of hope you do get akumatized. Maybe it’d give you perspective once I fix you.
...And Blackrose is so fiery...I just thought...
Whoa! Buffy, that's a neat trick.
Hmm... Corrin, I get the feeling you just kind of throw on whatever you have...
You know, I usually go clothes shopping with Alya, but if you wanted to get something new, it might fun.
D.Va, now that you’re out of your suit, can I call you Hana? I think it’s a way cooler name!
Hm… We have a lot of bodysuits here today… And interesting figures underneath them! U-um.
Curter. I mean. More Curt.
Er. I mean, in terms of the fashion not that... It'll fall off now... Uhm.
Uhm. Elena... I'm sorry it's come to this but for what it's worth, your dress is super pretty! Just like you!
Elena! It's still early, don't get too embarrassed! Someone like you would be terrifying if you're possessed!
It can get... breezy in Paris. I'd really rather not show my underwear if I don't want to.
I like fashion a lot, but uhm. I think I move too much for skirts to be part of my warddrobe.
O-of course you’d wear underwear under your clothes!
The only person I can think of that doesn’t wear underwear under her clothes is Raven…
Z-zone might be lewd enough to go without underwear, but I don’t think you’re like that, Florina!
I have a feeling that Zone-tan just assumes most women are naked under their clothes. I mean, wot nearing under...Not wearing underwear!
You’re mean *and* slutty. It’s a shame San Fransokyo U wasted a spot on you. Even Max didn’t get in!
Oh, you want to try and slap me? Bring it on!
Well, I’ve shown you mine, so I hope you don’t mind showing me yours? Y-your secret identity, that is! Definitely not anything else. Um...
You know, about taking it all off?
W-wouldn’t that get really drafty, Florina? And if you move, everyone would see… Well, everything.
It’s black! I think I’ve figured out how your powers work! You drain people’s color to black, then… Um… I don’t know.
Oh! You have such nice legs, Meg! I don’t think anyone minds you showing those off.
Hmm, a matching set, I hope? It's not polka dots, but I like patterns a lot!
Erk. I’ve never shirted a stranger either.
Um. Ann, are you staring because you like Nagisa, or because her bra looks like sweets?
Oh! I tend not to match my underwear either unless… Uhm. I’m planning on losing it.
W-well, I’m glad you’re still in the game, Nagisa!
You seem a bit embarrassed, but keep your composure I'm sure you know how to *rise* to the challenge!
Is that huge sword just like… A centerpiece of some sort?
U-uhm. Yes. Yes we did just see that, Ruby. Good thing you don’t seem to like sheer panties…
With all three of here, we're almost a ladybug sandwich! With me right in the middle!
Is this Metroid I hear so much about the name of your Kwami?
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, D.Va?
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, Samus?
Whoa, your body suit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...But regeneration sounds great!
guess my Japanese is worse than I thought… Hmm… I thought I’d get along really well with her…
Ghosts don’t usually wear a lot of clothes… W-wait, that’s not just… part…
You can't rely on a superhero to come save you.
A ladybug can't change her spots, but maybe you can, Vriska.
I hope whatever you picked next is a bit more unique to you instead of trying to mock me.
I still haven't forgiven you, you know. You've been really rude all game.
Maybe this next set'll be a bit humbling for you.
But nothing like you.
Or as flexible, because I usually take my time in the mornings. To, um, get to classes and such.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
~name~ has really pretty eyes, and a good sense of herself.
There’s no shame in joining me!
You know, sometimes I do wonder what it'd have been like to have a more typical hair color...
Oh! I love hair like yours, ~name~. Black never goes out of style!
I wonder if blondes do have more fun.
You picked a really cute ~clothing~ to go with the brightness of your hair, ~name~!
Huh. You know. Is there a term for people like us? With blue hair? Blunette sounds kinda...
Wow! I'm always happy to see other people with blue hair! Really! E-er! Just maybe not in a game like this!
I get a little jealous about brown hair like ~name~'s. It's just so timeless!
A nice thing about being a brunette must be that you call pull off just about any outfit like your ~clothing~, right, ~name~?
Wow! So, I mean, I could um. Just stutted. Stutter! About your ~clothing~! But your hair is so impressive, ~name~!
O-oh! Zut! ~name~! Your hair looks beautiful when it's coordinated with your ~clothing~!
By the way, ~name~, I wanted you to know I really like your hair! It reminds me of Alya! A-and in a game like this, that's certainly a comfort.
Don't let anyone ever make fun of you for your hair, ~name~! Your soul has to burn as brightly as your locks! E-er. Sorry, that sounds really deep.
Green hair? Hmm... Is that natural, or did you just go swimming, ~name~?
Pink hair? Oh! Just like Alyx! I hope you're just as quick on your feet, ~name~!
Pink hair is pretty unusual. Unlike the really common blue variety. You should feel special, ~name~!
Purple hair? Even Juleka's hair is naturally black...
Couldn't you have settled for blue?
Purple hair? Even Juleka's hair is naturally black...
Couldn't you have settled for blue?
If you ever wanted to dye it, I bet you could do such cool colors, ~name~!
Wow! Your hair's so... So lovely! It's like fresh snow, ~name~!
And costume for… Oh.
I can call you that, right? Now that we’re both unmasked?
The rest of you looks much better. Um. Especially the... Not clothes parts.
Yeah, sandals are a bit... Um. (How do I say they're not attractive without being really mean?)
I can’t believe that’s what’s going to happen if I can’t get out of this...
U-um. I think ~name~ is definitely finished. And besides, isn’t...Cum...I mean um! That’s the point!
Florina, are you… Interested in ~name~?
Comment impoli d’associer un point culminant a la mort, Spooky.
Goddess or no, I see you have a wide variety of skills, Zizou.
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me. You're safe now, go on home… Um, when the game’s over.
Oh no! Aimee!? A-are you okay?
Okay. She’s done, but just because she’s naked doesn’t mean we can trust her.
You did great, Florina! You should be proud for keeping up your resolve, and for singing such a cool song!
No more masturbating for you, a-kyu-ma. I definitely won’t forget about what Kyu did tonight, Kyu.
About taste... I wonder if you’d be like freshly cut grass, given... everything you’ve shown and talked about.
That play was… Adorable! Nagisa, but you don’t need to be so embarrassed by what everyone does! Even... me!
You know, mecha were always fascinating to me. That’s by far the most erotic way it’s ever been explained to me!
Wait! You're Sharla! Oh goodness. I'm so sorry it took so long to remember.
E-er. This is kinda a lot more wet than when you were in your swimsuit, Vriska... I feel a little bad. Well, a little.
Time to de-evilize! Oh no, I don’t have my yoyo! Wait a minute… Oh... It was just Zizou’s magic.
Nothing to be ashamed of... You for being undressed, me for... watching out for you.
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.
W-well. ~name~, you're n-not really from my normal palette when it comes to designing clothes...
Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
I-
Again!?
I guess you could say you missed the forest for the leaves!
Is... IS THAT BLOOD?
That’s blood, isn’t it? Possessed or not, you need to be stopped, Ayano! You’re insane! I won’t let you win!
Try having two identities and a bunch of friends with crushes on each other.
H-hey! Sait a wecond! W-wait a second! Were you naked this whole time!?
H-hold on there, Felicia! W-what are you--?
Oh, so there’s a good twist, right--
What’s the sitch Kim? Just comparing catchphrases!
Don’t bug out, Kim...Just compare our catchphrases!
I mean, because that’s how I activate and deactivate my costume…
Did someone shame you for your body? Is that why you're like this?
Moon, we can already see...
Wow, your uniform is surprisingly… Compressive. I-Impressive?
W-wait a second!
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
Oh! I do. Your breasts are--
I’m sorry, it seems you… Um, have gotten rather naked.
Shazza, you're a lot bigger in person than I expected! I just hadn't gotten the chance to say it.
Surrender, Shego! The two of us have you cornered! Give up!
Hmm... That's an interesting trick, Twilight. I'm glad you're staying modest!
Hmm... I wonder if Buffy taught you that, or if she's just a really fast learner...

(I know what it's like to have a bunch of magic you aren't sure what to do with... I should try and be a little nicer, if just to make her lower her guard so I can break that die of hers and release the akuma.)
(She puts up a tough act. But she's probably just scared and really insecure... I can't even tell if she's akumatized. I mostly just... Feel bad for her. I should be a little nicer.)
You're really confusing, Yang. You seem to be able to really have a lot of fun, but you aren't obnoxious...
L-look at ~name~ go. I admire that self-familiarity.
I could use the extra coverage, about now.
W-what? You can fly on a pegasus! That’s incredible, Florina! A-and sorry, ~name~, about your ~clothing~. And spine.
Whoa, Sonya. That's... Wow, body paint. I didn't think I was into this. I guess I am, though.
Zoey, what do you mean by rodeo?
Shimmy? Oh! That’s a fun word to say! Shimmy...Shimmy...Shimmy...Erk. Sorry, ~name~, I got distracted...
I’m sure, even faced with a tentacle monster, ~name~ would hold her ground, Zone! No wardrobe destruction. Or. Um. Destruction of orifices.
Erm, Aimee... This seems very, very dangerous. And if a hero is telling you that...
At very least, I don't have to worry about you as a villain... You seem to only hit yourself...
Don’t worry, Florina! I’m sure Huey was safely out of range!
A-Aimee, I'd use my Lucky Charm to reverse time if you made a mistake, but there's no akumas here for me to use it on...
A-Aimee, I might die of embarrassment, but if you do that wrong, you'll actually die!
Aimee! You sure aren’t making sounds like that was a sure shot! Be careful!
Erm. If you do though, could you please *not* bring it here?
Hmm... Maybe now's not a great time, but could you do... Fashion Victim by Green Day?
Alpha, I know you're digital but... You're pretty and definitely express your personality well. That's all you.
Wow! Those are cool tattoos, Blackrose!
U-um, those are tattoos, right? Those wavy things, and not scars? R-right?
H-hey Aimee! I-I just work with someone that's just as cute--I mean looks like her!
O-oh. Well, this is embarrassing. I’m not really used to… Um… A scenario where something like you wasn’t just possessed.
Well, I guess Alpha is an AI that’s not possessed… I think. I’m keeping an eye on you, Chica.
I really think well-made armor can keep you really mobile, right? Maybe just not as mobile as me.
I'm really not one for armor, but my suit does really increase my pain tolerance and agility.
I'd say you're finally coming out of your shell, Corrin, but you definitely seem fine with this.
(She looks kind of like a frillier, female Adrien... Hmm...)
I think most people know a breastplate is also a chestplate. Don’t get so worried, Florina!
Aww! You two are so sweet on each other!
I understand how you feel, Florina, but nothing’s wrong. You’re doing great!
That sounds really embarrassing... Is that why you're so... O-oh. N-nevermind.
W-wait a second, t-that's-- That's so vulgar, GoGo!
Well! I applaud you being so clever! I’m definitely not sure what it would be like to take mine off piecemeal like that.
Futaba, I mean… I'm still interested in men but Gwen’s… Impressive in her own right...
It's not like I haven't had a similar bond with some of the villains I've fought...
I’m so sorry. I wish my Lucky Charm could heal those. You’re still an amazing detective, I can tell even from this game…
Um. Are your wings sensitive, Kyu?
Um, what about your mouth? It’s very cute but I’d rather the only dirty parts be your language.
N-no?
J-just because I don’t get a lot of chances to look at body art. But even without the art you’re really… You know…
O-oh. I guess it didn’t work… Maybe she meant Thoth, like that Egyptian god the Pharaoh channeled?
W-w-wait!? Where'd all the bats come from!?
Um...I don’t know about that. Maybe you’re a warmer person than me?
They’re very classy, Nugi-chan. I recognize high quality clothing anywhere, and I’ll make sure they’re treated well!
I-I do mean sandals. M-meaning sandals are fine for the beach and your clothes, I just don’t like them. I-I’m not looking at your… Butt.
I’ve never really seen a statuesque person undress before, so this is a bit novel to me.
Palutena, I do have to wonder what a goddess looks like under her um...last lines of defense.
And you certainly seem enchanting! I guess if you're not akumatized, you're alright by me!
One piece of clothing at a time! Er... Hopefully losing here will make you rethink things?
I could tie her up with my yo-yo but I think she’d like that far too much...
I mean, you’re an attractive woman taking off her clothes… Wait, did you mean… Your feet?
Er… What, the feet? Is this a thing people…
Bye-bye little butterfly.
Um. Aella, I feel like we're due for a random encounter soon. It looks like it's going to be a big one...
S-surely you're hiding something else in your ~clothing~, ~name~! T-this is a joke, right?
W-well, don't you look aroused at the prospect of getting naked in front of strangers...
Bye bye... um... little butterfly?
Way to keep your composure, ~name~! It's still so compact!
I’d let him storm my Normandy.
You say this Camilla is your wife? She must be a very patient woman!
Um! I'll-- Um! I-I'm actually really excited to see this.
Show me what you have, hero.
O-oh. Oh no, I have very much misinterpreted this relationship. I am so sorry.
Lucky me!
I’m a big fan of this shirt. So I’m a bigger fan of keeping it on.
Alice, do you have some sort of... Dream-based Miraculous?
Whoa Ms. Hedgehog, think before you draw!
Hey pretty kitty, look before you leap!
Um...What’s a PTR, D.Va? Is that some special Overwatch training?
Sorry, what were you saying about cheating? You’ve been like that for way too many hands, D.Va…
I don’t cheat! I’m just innately lucky. You’re one to talk, Ms. No-Miraculous-But Miraculously-Good-At-Games!
What? Queen Bee? Already? Where?
Um...Sorry… Queen Bee is a… Frenemy? I don’t think you’d know her, Florina.
Huey? Who is Huey?
Korra, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman? Can you use your spirit powers to talk to her?
Marceline, I’m sorry. I guess I know how must feel to be hunted, when all you’re trying to do is be a good person. And you are a good person. And I’m sorry for being...persistent.
Um, Meia, I was thinking about what you said... Earlier. Earth has lots of ladybugs! It’s what inspired my costume!
Birth control? Oh, um. Not that I-I really need it that much, but when I do, I make sure sure that appropriate measures are in place so I can feel my partner’s skin on mine.
Hmm...Have you heard of a Nue, Nagisa? I feel like it’d be a cool subject for a play! Kwami are kind of similar!
Nagisa, I don’t want to look for too long but it seems like you have a normal... butt... to me.
W-wait, this is your first time? Looks like we have even more in common than I thought, Nagisa!
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? I hear those types of stories are really popular, especially if the ghost is trying to help the living be happy!
Tikki, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman…
Hm. Nagisa, I don’t mean to frighten you, but do you know someone named Fuko-chan?
You know, Nagisa, if you were going to have a Miraculous, I have a feeling a Starfish might work really well for you!
W-wait, you’re not real, Nugi-chan? You’re an AI like Alpha?
Palutena, you’ve got me thinking that Tikki is a bit more powerful than you let on. You supply your champions with all kinds of...lucky charms, don’t you?
Clothes aren’t evil, Ryuko! Your taste could use some work though.
Probability control, you mean like… Really good luck? I’m happy my miraculous can alter reality, but I don’t even think it can save us from these hands...
Oh no, little dingo, watch your cards carefully!
These cards are kind of like your summoner seals, are they, Sheena? Maybe if you thought of it that way, you’d be in better shape?
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? Not like Spooky… Someone friendly, trying to do the right thing!
Oh! Your pegasus! I cannot get over how cool that is, Florina!
Not a lucky charm, but I can make it work! I think!
Dealer, what’s the... deal…(Marinette, you’re punning. Stop.)
Hmm... I wonder whose turn it is? Or will be. Curiosity killed the cat but it isn’t much use to Ladybugs either, I think.
Okay, Aimee, 48 specialties. Are any of them taking things seriously?
Aimee! Don’t be mean to them just because they don’t talk much. They have a voice, they just don’t express it in words.
Actually, Alpha, could you promote my friend Nino’s mixtape?
You know, I feel like more heroes should use shields, Cap. If I spin my yo-yo just right, I can use it to block attacks. I’d um. Show you, but...
I heard someone say there was something cursed? I happen to have just to have a reliable solution to that!
I’m not going to go easy. I’m here to win, but I’m also not out to shame anyone!
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
D.Va, my costume has been worn by all sorts of people over the years. I haven’t heard of Widowmaker. Is he some kind of bodysuit designer?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat? D.Va, better watch out, as she's the bunniest of all of us!
Oh! Well, that's an interesting story, Dark Magician Girl. Though I like your hair as it is now! (Even the lack thereof on your...)
Don’t worry, Florina! I may not be a tank, but I’m pretty durable and I’ll make sure you have nothing to be afraid of!
Believe in yourself, Florina! You can be brave all on your own. Be proud of your body and heart!
Don’t worry, Florina! Lyn is here, and she’ll keep you safe, even if I can’t.
Wow, Futaba, you're really attached to your headphones. Even though you're um... Losing.
Hey, Futaba, you seem really attached to those headphones. They’re very nice, but, it’s not like they’re magic, right? Do you need those to activate your Miraculous-- Erk, your Persona?
I-I… I don't--I mean, if you're offering, Futaba, you’re pretty! B-but you remind me a little too much of Alya for it not to be weird...
U-uh-um. I wouldn't sorry about--wouldnt worry about that… What about you?
(Futaba, your secret identity is Medjed, right? I'm really impressed by the good you do! It can be a little hard to cover all the white collar crime.)
We both go with what works, I think. I bet we’d have a lot of fun finding you new clothes, Futaba! I can be punky too!
E-er-- I like Gwen. Like. Um, you know, like, Gah! I’m just-- I’m… Erk.
Aww, Futaba has a boyfriend! I think? That’s adorable!
Have you heard of the Ladyblog, Futaba?
The Ladyblog gets the good parts. Mostly! About, you know, superhero stuff. (I wonder if it's me or Futaba that needs to get out more...)
Maybe I should pick up a copy of the Bugle. Or maybe you should start a blog, Gwen. I’d leave this out, though, oui?
MLB? Isn’t that like… A sport, in America? And did you just call me cute?
U-um. I guess if you can get me to lose, you’ll find out.
I’d be interested to see how you interact with reporters, Gwen!
Well, not in this universe, Gwen! Y-you can hardly blame me for, um, being imprecise. I’m sorry if I hurt your feelings!
Well, Gwen, according to *my* canon, yes! I’d love to visit it again. We could go swinging through the skyscrapers together!
Hey! English isn’t my first language. Don’t be rude… But how’d you get a d’aww reel? Erk. Raw deal?
Under where, my suit? Magic, Gwen, obviously.
Gwen, do you *like* it when I speak to you in French?
Sorry, I’m a little… startled by butterflies. It’s what you might say is… An occupational hazard.

state.i: Meia? Vraiment, salope? Tu veux entrer dans ça?

case.state: Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Um. Nagisa, I hate to tell you this but after careful scrutiny there’s no odd scar there. Just a crack.
Did... Did Pit just leave? Oh no, if I got distracted and he gets akumatized, that'll be awful! Pit come back!
Sei, your armor looks kind of like Hawkmoth…
Wait, there’s a club for people like us? And I wasn’t invited! I’d love to be a part!
Uh, Sei, when you frame Hawk Moth that way it is really creepy…
You’re good at feeling up holes, Sheena? Oh my that’s forwa-- Oh. I-I thought you tripped over your words. Erm. (I’m going to go die of embarrassment now.)
See, Spooky? You gave me a big scare!
Y-yow did hou!? W-what the-- Vriska! Stop it!

G-gah! How dare you i-imply!
