Are you... wait... no... that's not right...
Oh! You're Shazza, right! W-wait...
Don’t be so hard on yourself! Dealing with spirits is really challenging, and you do that really well!
Sometimes you lose a few hands, Sheena. Don’t worry. I’ll make sure you stay safe. From one spirit person to another.
Y-you know, maybe this can wait until after the game. Don't you use card-like seals? You're a bit... behind right now.
Spooky? Give me the knife, please. Let’s put away our weapons.
I’m glad to see the senzu bean grows far from the vine, Videl!
Gloves! Gloves are coming off!
H-hey! What are you doing!? Are you copying my Miraculous?
What magic is this?! Did you have a Miraculous this whole time!?
Whoa! You're going to detransform too right--
I mean Alya got akumatized into a cyber-villain. If I could save her, beating you--er, saving you--should be easy!
At least that was a cool outfit. Definitely not stolen. *Cough* Pot *cough* meet *cough* kettle *cough*.
Say, Futaba, is Vriska's outfit like that Tron movie? Could you help me out with this?
Though maybe you have the Lion Miraculous, given how overconfident and prideful you're acting.
Looks like you've been plundered, Vriska.
E-er, I'm definitely not into the whole maid thing, so I'm hoping whatever comes next is... A bit better.
At least you finally settled on some casualwear... Why are you transforming again?
So, what'll it be this time, Vriska? Some sort of "goddess of luck" outfit?
So, what'll it be this time, Vriska? Some sort of "wandering martial artist" look?
Yes, Weiss. We know how rich you are. Your father owns a hotel and is a mayor or something, blah blah blah…
Not all wealth is material, Weiss.
Blake, is Weiss always this… Bourgeois?
Yang, is Weiss always like this… Repugnant?
Yang, is Weiss always this… Yawn-inducing?
And your hair does look pretty! It’s a very cool texture and color.
You know, I used to read this magazine called Bleach... The models wore something fancy like that!
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
I have secret... it’s that I’m really good at poker!
Um. I'd love to take you up on that, Elizabeth. But didn't you clean yourself off just now?
Thanks Mei! I would love to play with you again!
Oh! U-um. Merci, Nugi-chan?
Well, sorry everyone. But I’m going to use Lucky Charm to erase Streaming-chan’s footage. At least you’ll have something for lonely nights.
Oh, that’s a nice ~clothing~, mind if I try it on?
~name~’s worked really hard to get into that kind of shape. You don’t stand a chance, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is always upbeat. And I will *never* let you take that away from her.
~name~’s confidence isn’t going to be eroded by your lies, Ayano!
~name~ has killer fashion sense. Believe me. I’d know.
~name~ saves and helps lots of people regularly.
~name~ has a pure soul, and if Hawk Moth can’t touch her, neither can you!
~name~ doesn’t have a mean bone in her body. You could learn from her.
You know, Ayano does have a point, ~name~...
B-bad girl...Florina, u-uhm. Can you say that again? For posteriors? I mean, posterity?
~name~ guides and protects her people with great skill.
~name~ has lots of witty remarks. Though she can be hard to deal with sometimes, someone with that insightful of a mind can’t fall prey to your tricks.
~name~ has her pick of the boys--or girls--and it’s because of her shining personality. If ~player~ wants her, she’d be a much better choice than an obsessive monster like you.
~name~ is already in a committed relationship, and she doesn’t need ~player~, but given how you’re acting, you definitely don’t need them either!
~name~ has a lot going for her, and she’s competitive in ways neither you nor I are. Don’t talk down to her or make her lose faith in herself!
~name~ is adored by her fans, and is used to facing danger. You better watch your threats, Ayano!
Just because ~name~ is misguided, doesn’t mean that she doesn’t have redeeming qualities. Maybe if you didn’t pick on her, she wouldn’t do what she does?
Ahh!!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
Your taste is very vintage, and very eclectic.
Like... I think you'd look great in a red jumpsuit!
Wait, you’re taking your skirt off first?
Those are… Impressive!
Um… It’s a very haute chic look, April! But yes, we can… See what you’re wearing underneath.
E-even though you're losing your dress, I want you to stay proud, because I know what it's like to have two very different parents, and to meet so many... interesting people.
Er... Had. It's weird you haven't found a kwami for yourself...
E-er, don’t get down Ayano, it’s... Just a game.
Based on how you’ve acted towards everyone else, I kind of hope you do get akumatized. Maybe it’d give you perspective once I fix you.
...And Blackrose is so fiery...I just thought...
Whoa! Buffy, that's a neat trick.
Hmm... Corrin, I get the feeling you just kind of throw on whatever you have...
You know, I usually go clothes shopping with Alya, but if you wanted to get something new, it might fun.
D.Va, now that you’re out of your suit, can I call you Hana? I think it’s a way cooler name!
Hm… We have a lot of bodysuits here today… And interesting figures underneath them! U-um.
Curter. I mean. More Curt.
Er. I mean, in terms of the fashion not that... It'll fall off now... Uhm.
Uhm. Elena... I'm sorry it's come to this but for what it's worth, your dress is super pretty! Just like you!
Elena! It's still early, don't get too embarrassed! Someone like you would be terrifying if you're possessed!
It can get... breezy in Paris. I'd really rather not show my underwear if I don't want to.
I like fashion a lot, but uhm. I think I move too much for skirts to be part of my warddrobe.
O-of course you’d wear underwear under your clothes!
The only person I can think of that doesn’t wear underwear under her clothes is Raven…
Z-zone might be lewd enough to go without underwear, but I don’t think you’re like that, Florina!
I have a feeling that Zone-tan just assumes most women are naked under their clothes. I mean, wot nearing under...Not wearing underwear!
You’re mean *and* slutty. It’s a shame San Fransokyo U wasted a spot on you. Even Max didn’t get in!
Oh, you want to try and slap me? Bring it on!
Well, I’ve shown you mine, so I hope you don’t mind showing me yours? Y-your secret identity, that is! Definitely not anything else. Um...
You know, about taking it all off?
W-wouldn’t that get really drafty, Florina? And if you move, everyone would see… Well, everything.
It’s black! I think I’ve figured out how your powers work! You drain people’s color to black, then… Um… I don’t know.
Oh! You have such nice legs, Meg! I don’t think anyone minds you showing those off.
Hmm, a matching set, I hope? It's not polka dots, but I like patterns a lot!
Erk. I’ve never shirted a stranger either.
Um. Ann, are you staring because you like Nagisa, or because her bra looks like sweets?
Oh! I tend not to match my underwear either unless… Uhm. I’m planning on losing it.
W-well, I’m glad you’re still in the game, Nagisa!
You seem a bit embarrassed, but keep your composure I'm sure you know how to *rise* to the challenge!
Is that huge sword just like… A centerpiece of some sort?
U-uhm. Yes. Yes we did just see that, Ruby. Good thing you don’t seem to like sheer panties…
With all three of here, we're almost a ladybug sandwich! With me right in the middle!
Is this Metroid I hear so much about the name of your Kwami?
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, D.Va?
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, Samus?
Whoa, your body suit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...But regeneration sounds great!
guess my Japanese is worse than I thought… Hmm… I thought I’d get along really well with her…
Ghosts don’t usually wear a lot of clothes… W-wait, that’s not just… part…
You can't rely on a superhero to come save you.
A ladybug can't change her spots, but maybe you can, Vriska.
I hope whatever you picked next is a bit more unique to you instead of trying to mock me.
I still haven't forgiven you, you know. You've been really rude all game.
Maybe this next set'll be a bit humbling for you.
But nothing like you.
Or as flexible, because I usually take my time in the mornings. To, um, get to classes and such.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
~name~ has really pretty eyes, and a good sense of herself.
I-is that it?
And costume for… Oh.
I can call you that, right? Now that we’re both unmasked?
The rest of you looks much better. Um. Especially the... Not clothes parts.
Yeah, sandals are a bit... Um. (How do I say they're not attractive without being really mean?)
I can’t believe that’s what’s going to happen if I can’t get out of this...
U-um. I think ~name~ is definitely finished. And besides, isn’t...Cum...I mean um! That’s the point!
Florina, are you… Interested in ~name~?
Comment impoli d’associer un point culminant a la mort, Spooky.
Goddess or no, I see you have a wide variety of skills, Zizou.
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me. You're safe now, go on home… Um, when the game’s over.
Oh no! Aimee!? A-are you okay?
Okay. She’s done, but just because she’s naked doesn’t mean we can trust her.
You did great, Florina! You should be proud for keeping up your resolve, and for singing such a cool song!
No more masturbating for you, a-kyu-ma. I definitely won’t forget about what Kyu did tonight, Kyu.
About taste... I wonder if you’d be like freshly cut grass, given... everything you’ve shown and talked about.
That play was… Adorable! Nagisa, but you don’t need to be so embarrassed by what everyone does! Even... me!
You know, mecha were always fascinating to me. That’s by far the most erotic way it’s ever been explained to me!
Wait! You're Sharla! Oh goodness. I'm so sorry it took so long to remember.
E-er. This is kinda a lot more wet than when you were in your swimsuit, Vriska... I feel a little bad. Well, a little.
Time to de-evilize! Oh no, I don’t have my yoyo! Wait a minute… Oh... It was just Zizou’s magic.
Mine might be small but they’re up to the test...
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.
W-well. ~name~, you're n-not really from my normal palette when it comes to designing clothes...
Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
I-
Again!?
I guess you could say you missed the forest for the leaves!
Is... IS THAT BLOOD?
That’s blood, isn’t it? Possessed or not, you need to be stopped, Ayano! You’re insane! I won’t let you win!
Try having two identities and a bunch of friends with crushes on each other.
H-hey! Sait a wecond! W-wait a second! Were you naked this whole time!?
H-hold on there, Felicia! W-what are you--?
Oh, so there’s a good twist, right--
What’s the sitch Kim? Just comparing catchphrases!
Don’t bug out, Kim...Just compare our catchphrases!
I mean, because that’s how I activate and deactivate my costume…
Did someone shame you for your body? Is that why you're like this?
Moon, we can already see...
Wow, your uniform is surprisingly… Compressive. I-Impressive?
W-wait a second!
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
Oh! I do. Your breasts are--
I’m sorry, it seems you… Um, have gotten rather naked.
Shazza, you're a lot bigger in person than I expected! I just hadn't gotten the chance to say it.
Surrender, Shego! The two of us have you cornered! Give up!
Hmm... That's an interesting trick, Twilight. I'm glad you're staying modest!
Hmm... I wonder if Buffy taught you that, or if she's just a really fast learner...

(I know what it's like to have a bunch of magic you aren't sure what to do with... I should try and be a little nicer, if just to make her lower her guard so I can break that die of hers and release the akuma.)
(She puts up a tough act. But she's probably just scared and really insecure... I can't even tell if she's akumatized. I mostly just... Feel bad for her. I should be a little nicer.)
You're really confusing, Yang. You seem to be able to really have a lot of fun, but you aren't obnoxious...
Ugh Marinette stop!
You must be working for Hawk Moth.
I had just hoped I’d be recognized for something like designing clothes, or saving the world.
Whoa, Sonya. That's... Wow, body paint. I didn't think I was into this. I guess I am, though.
Zoey, what do you mean by rodeo?
Shimmy? Oh! That’s a fun word to say! Shimmy...Shimmy...Shimmy...Erk. Sorry, ~name~, I got distracted...
I’m sure, even faced with a tentacle monster, ~name~ would hold her ground, Zone! No wardrobe destruction. Or. Um. Destruction of orifices.
Erm, Aimee... This seems very, very dangerous. And if a hero is telling you that...
At very least, I don't have to worry about you as a villain... You seem to only hit yourself...
Don’t worry, Florina! I’m sure Huey was safely out of range!
A-Aimee, I'd use my Lucky Charm to reverse time if you made a mistake, but there's no akumas here for me to use it on...
A-Aimee, I might die of embarrassment, but if you do that wrong, you'll actually die!
Aimee! You sure aren’t making sounds like that was a sure shot! Be careful!
Erm. If you do though, could you please *not* bring it here?
Hmm... Maybe now's not a great time, but could you do... Fashion Victim by Green Day?
Alpha, I know you're digital but... You're pretty and definitely express your personality well. That's all you.
Wow! Those are cool tattoos, Blackrose!
U-um, those are tattoos, right? Those wavy things, and not scars? R-right?
H-hey Aimee! I-I just work with someone that's just as cute--I mean looks like her!
O-oh. Well, this is embarrassing. I’m not really used to… Um… A scenario where something like you wasn’t just possessed.
Well, I guess Alpha is an AI that’s not possessed… I think. I’m keeping an eye on you, Chica.
I really think well-made armor can keep you really mobile, right? Maybe just not as mobile as me.
I'm really not one for armor, but my suit does really increase my pain tolerance and agility.
I'd say you're finally coming out of your shell, Corrin, but you definitely seem fine with this.
(She looks kind of like a frillier, female Adrien... Hmm...)
I think most people know a breastplate is also a chestplate. Don’t get so worried, Florina!
Aww! You two are so sweet on each other!
I understand how you feel, Florina, but nothing’s wrong. You’re doing great!
That sounds really embarrassing... Is that why you're so... O-oh. N-nevermind.
W-wait a second, t-that's-- That's so vulgar, GoGo!
Well! I applaud you being so clever! I’m definitely not sure what it would be like to take mine off piecemeal like that.
Futaba, I mean… I'm still interested in men but Gwen’s… Impressive in her own right...
It's not like I haven't had a similar bond with some of the villains I've fought...
I’m so sorry. I wish my Lucky Charm could heal those. You’re still an amazing detective, I can tell even from this game…
Um. Are your wings sensitive, Kyu?
Um, what about your mouth? It’s very cute but I’d rather the only dirty parts be your language.
N-no?
J-just because I don’t get a lot of chances to look at body art. But even without the art you’re really… You know…
O-oh. I guess it didn’t work… Maybe she meant Thoth, like that Egyptian god the Pharaoh channeled?
W-w-wait!? Where'd all the bats come from!?
Um...I don’t know about that. Maybe you’re a warmer person than me?
They’re very classy, Nugi-chan. I recognize high quality clothing anywhere, and I’ll make sure they’re treated well!
I-I do mean sandals. M-meaning sandals are fine for the beach and your clothes, I just don’t like them. I-I’m not looking at your… Butt.
I’ve never really seen a statuesque person undress before, so this is a bit novel to me.
Palutena, I do have to wonder what a goddess looks like under her um...last lines of defense.
And you certainly seem enchanting! I guess if you're not akumatized, you're alright by me!
One piece of clothing at a time! Er... Hopefully losing here will make you rethink things?
I could tie her up with my yo-yo but I think she’d like that far too much...
I mean, you’re an attractive woman taking off her clothes… Wait, did you mean… Your feet?
Er… What, the feet? Is this a thing people…
Bye-bye little butterfly.
Um. Aella, I feel like we're due for a random encounter soon. It looks like it's going to be a big one...
S-surely you're hiding something else in your ~clothing~, ~name~! T-this is a joke, right?
W-well, don't you look aroused at the prospect of getting naked in front of strangers...
Bye bye... um... little butterfly?
Way to keep your composure, ~name~! It's still so compact!
I’d let him storm my Normandy.
You say this Camilla is your wife? She must be a very patient woman!
Um! I'll-- Um! I-I'm actually really excited to see this.
Show me what you have, hero.
O-oh. Oh no, I have very much misinterpreted this relationship. I am so sorry.
No need to bug out just because you’re not me.
Looks like it’s not my turn. Well, except maybe to watch.
Sorry, what were you saying about cheating? You’ve been like that for way too many hands, D.Va…
I don’t cheat! I’m just innately lucky. You’re one to talk, Ms. No-Miraculous-But Miraculously-Good-At-Games!
What? Queen Bee? Already? Where?
Um...Sorry… Queen Bee is a… Frenemy? I don’t think you’d know her, Florina.
Huey? Who is Huey?
I have to say, Florina, you’ve given me a good memory that I’ll laugh about after I have some acupuncture...
Korra, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman? Can you use your spirit powers to talk to her?
Marceline, I’m sorry. I guess I know how must feel to be hunted, when all you’re trying to do is be a good person. And you are a good person. And I’m sorry for being...persistent.
Um, Meia, I was thinking about what you said... Earlier. Earth has lots of ladybugs! It’s what inspired my costume!
Birth control? Oh, um. Not that I-I really need it that much, but when I do, I make sure sure that appropriate measures are in place so I can feel my partner’s skin on mine.
Hmm...Have you heard of a Nue, Nagisa? I feel like it’d be a cool subject for a play! Kwami are kind of similar!
Nagisa, I don’t want to look for too long but it seems like you have a normal... butt... to me.
W-wait, this is your first time? Looks like we have even more in common than I thought, Nagisa!
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? I hear those types of stories are really popular, especially if the ghost is trying to help the living be happy!
Tikki, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman…
Hm. Nagisa, I don’t mean to frighten you, but do you know someone named Fuko-chan?
You know, Nagisa, if you were going to have a Miraculous, I have a feeling a Starfish might work really well for you!
W-wait, you’re not real, Nugi-chan? You’re an AI like Alpha?
Palutena, you’ve got me thinking that Tikki is a bit more powerful than you let on. You supply your champions with all kinds of...lucky charms, don’t you?
Clothes aren’t evil, Ryuko! Your taste could use some work though.
These cards are kind of like your summoner seals, are they, Sheena? Maybe if you thought of it that way, you’d be in better shape?
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? Not like Spooky… Someone friendly, trying to do the right thing!
Oh! Your pegasus! I cannot get over how cool that is, Florina!
Ah, Tikki, any advice?
You know Tikki, it’s not like you need to hide from these folks, could seriously use... well, more than this hand.
I think this will work?
Okay, Aimee, 48 specialties. Are any of them taking things seriously?
Aimee! Don’t be mean to them just because they don’t talk much. They have a voice, they just don’t express it in words.
Actually, Alpha, could you promote my friend Nino’s mixtape?
You know, I feel like more heroes should use shields, Cap. If I spin my yo-yo just right, I can use it to block attacks. I’d um. Show you, but...
I heard someone say there was something cursed? I happen to have just to have a reliable solution to that!
I’m not going to go easy. I’m here to win, but I’m also not out to shame anyone!
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
D.Va, my costume has been worn by all sorts of people over the years. I haven’t heard of Widowmaker. Is he some kind of bodysuit designer?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat? D.Va, better watch out, as she's the bunniest of all of us!
Oh! Well, that's an interesting story, Dark Magician Girl. Though I like your hair as it is now! (Even the lack thereof on your...)
Don’t worry, Florina! I may not be a tank, but I’m pretty durable and I’ll make sure you have nothing to be afraid of!
Believe in yourself, Florina! You can be brave all on your own. Be proud of your body and heart!
Don’t worry, Florina! Lyn is here, and she’ll keep you safe, even if I can’t.
Wow, Futaba, you're really attached to your headphones. Even though you're um... Losing.
Hey, Futaba, you seem really attached to those headphones. They’re very nice, but, it’s not like they’re magic, right? Do you need those to activate your Miraculous-- Erk, your Persona?
I-I… I don't--I mean, if you're offering, Futaba, you’re pretty! B-but you remind me a little too much of Alya for it not to be weird...
U-uh-um. I wouldn't sorry about--wouldnt worry about that… What about you?
(Futaba, your secret identity is Medjed, right? I'm really impressed by the good you do! It can be a little hard to cover all the white collar crime.)
We both go with what works, I think. I bet we’d have a lot of fun finding you new clothes, Futaba! I can be punky too!
E-er-- I like Gwen. Like. Um, you know, like, Gah! I’m just-- I’m… Erk.
Aww, Futaba has a boyfriend! I think? That’s adorable!
Have you heard of the Ladyblog, Futaba?
The Ladyblog gets the good parts. Mostly! About, you know, superhero stuff. (I wonder if it's me or Futaba that needs to get out more...)
Maybe I should pick up a copy of the Bugle. Or maybe you should start a blog, Gwen. I’d leave this out, though, oui?
MLB? Isn’t that like… A sport, in America? And did you just call me cute?
U-um. I guess if you can get me to lose, you’ll find out.
I’d be interested to see how you interact with reporters, Gwen!
Well, not in this universe, Gwen! Y-you can hardly blame me for, um, being imprecise. I’m sorry if I hurt your feelings!
Well, Gwen, according to *my* canon, yes! I’d love to visit it again. We could go swinging through the skyscrapers together!
Hey! English isn’t my first language. Don’t be rude… But how’d you get a d’aww reel? Erk. Raw deal?
Under where, my suit? Magic, Gwen, obviously.
Gwen, do you *like* it when I speak to you in French?
Sorry, I’m a little… startled by butterflies. It’s what you might say is… An occupational hazard.

state.i: Meia? Vraiment, salope? Tu veux entrer dans ça?

case.state: Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Um. Nagisa, I hate to tell you this but after careful scrutiny there’s no odd scar there. Just a crack.
Sei, your armor looks kind of like Hawkmoth…
Wait, there’s a club for people like us? And I wasn’t invited! I’d love to be a part!
Uh, Sei, when you frame Hawk Moth that way it is really creepy…
You’re good at feeling up holes, Sheena? Oh my that’s forwa-- Oh. I-I thought you tripped over your words. Erm. (I’m going to go die of embarrassment now.)
See, Spooky? You gave me a big scare!
Y-yow did hou!? W-what the-- Vriska! Stop it!
It has to be snug, Vriska! Or else it's an impediment to mobility!
G-gah! How dare you i-imply!
Moi? Affame d'attention?! How dare you, Vriska!
Hey Kyu, do you think you'd be a good influence on Vriska? With that blue outfit of hers, I feel like she could use a fairy guide.
You know, Vriska, I still didn't cheat. I may have supernatural luck but I'd never use it except against villains.

And another thing, Vriska... I'm glad you think I'm pretty, but don't you think you're selling yourself a little short, too? If you were more confident in yourself, I bet you'd be happier. And could cheat less.
I'm honored you think I'm pretty, Vriska. But don't forget that you're the prettiest grey-skinned troll I've ever met, too! I bet we could be friends if you acted less insecure.
Zizou… Sorry, that was brave of you, I just get freaked out by purple butterflies. For obvious reasons.
Yattane? What does that mean, Zizou?
Je veux... coucher... Zone-tan, now? I think we’re a bit busy to take a nap.
Je veux... coucher... O-oh! Zone! W-well… M-maybe once I know you’re not possessed.
Zone-tan, I was thinking about tentacles...I do kind of cover myself with magic armor regularly… Maybe you find tentacles a similar comfort? N-not the probing…
W-wait Zone-tan, you didn’t just...Proposition me? Did you?
Wait a minute, is this a ploy to get me on one of your videos!? That is absolutely not okay!
I don’t really understand your fixation with tentacles,Zone…

Sometimes you lose a few hands, Sheena. Don’t worry. I’ll make sure you stay safe. From one spirit person to another.
Y-you know, maybe this can wait until after the game. Don't you use card-like seals? You're a bit... behind right now.
Spooky? Give me the knife, please. Let’s put away our weapons.
I’m glad to see the senzu bean grows far from the vine, Videl!
Gloves! Gloves are coming off!
H-hey! What are you doing!? Are you copying my Miraculous?
What magic is this?! Did you have a Miraculous this whole time!?
Whoa! You're going to detransform too right--
I mean Alya got akumatized into a cyber-villain. If I could save her, beating you--er, saving you--should be easy!
At least that was a cool outfit. Definitely not stolen. *Cough* Pot *cough* meet *cough* kettle *cough*.
Say, Futaba, is Vriska's outfit like that Tron movie? Could you help me out with this?
Though maybe you have the Lion Miraculous, given how overconfident and prideful you're acting.
Looks like you've been plundered, Vriska.
E-er, I'm definitely not into the whole maid thing, so I'm hoping whatever comes next is... A bit better.
At least you finally settled on some casualwear... Why are you transforming again?
So, what'll it be this time, Vriska? Some sort of "goddess of luck" outfit?
So, what'll it be this time, Vriska? Some sort of "wandering martial artist" look?
Yes, Weiss. We know how rich you are. Your father owns a hotel and is a mayor or something, blah blah blah…
Not all wealth is material, Weiss.
Blake, is Weiss always this… Bourgeois?
Yang, is Weiss always like this… Repugnant?
Yang, is Weiss always this… Yawn-inducing?
And your hair does look pretty! It’s a very cool texture and color.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
I have secret... it’s that I’m really good at poker!
Um. I'd love to take you up on that, Elizabeth. But didn't you clean yourself off just now?
Thanks Mei! I would love to play with you again!
Oh! U-um. Merci, Nugi-chan?
Well, sorry everyone. But I’m going to use Lucky Charm to erase Streaming-chan’s footage. At least you’ll have something for lonely nights.
I like what you were wearing underneath that.
~name~’s worked really hard to get into that kind of shape. You don’t stand a chance, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is willing to explore all kinds of people’s love. That’s an incredible things, Ayano.
~name~ is always upbeat. And I will *never* let you take that away from her.
~name~’s confidence isn’t going to be eroded by your lies, Ayano!
~name~ has killer fashion sense. Believe me. I’d know.
~name~ saves and helps lots of people regularly.
~name~ has a pure soul, and if Hawk Moth can’t touch her, neither can you!
~name~ doesn’t have a mean bone in her body. You could learn from her.
You know, Ayano does have a point, ~name~...
B-bad girl...Florina, u-uhm. Can you say that again? For posteriors? I mean, posterity?
~name~ guides and protects her people with great skill.
~name~ has lots of witty remarks. Though she can be hard to deal with sometimes, someone with that insightful of a mind can’t fall prey to your tricks.
~name~ has her pick of the boys--or girls--and it’s because of her shining personality. If ~player~ wants her, she’d be a much better choice than an obsessive monster like you.
~name~ is already in a committed relationship, and she doesn’t need ~player~, but given how you’re acting, you definitely don’t need them either!
~name~ has a lot going for her, and she’s competitive in ways neither you nor I are. Don’t talk down to her or make her lose faith in herself!
~name~ is adored by her fans, and is used to facing danger. You better watch your threats, Ayano!
Just because ~name~ is misguided, doesn’t mean that she doesn’t have redeeming qualities. Maybe if you didn’t pick on her, she wouldn’t do what she does?
Ahh!!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
Your taste is very vintage, and very eclectic.
Like... I think you'd look great in a red jumpsuit!
Wait, you’re taking your skirt off first?
Those are… Impressive!
Um… It’s a very haute chic look, April! But yes, we can… See what you’re wearing underneath.
E-even though you're losing your dress, I want you to stay proud, because I know what it's like to have two very different parents, and to meet so many... interesting people.
Er... Had. It's weird you haven't found a kwami for yourself...
E-er, don’t get down Ayano, it’s... Just a game.
Based on how you’ve acted towards everyone else, I kind of hope you do get akumatized. Maybe it’d give you perspective once I fix you.
...And Blackrose is so fiery...I just thought...
Whoa! Buffy, that's a neat trick.
Hmm... Corrin, I get the feeling you just kind of throw on whatever you have...
You know, I usually go clothes shopping with Alya, but if you wanted to get something new, it might fun.
D.Va, now that you’re out of your suit, can I call you Hana? I think it’s a way cooler name!
Hm… We have a lot of bodysuits here today… And interesting figures underneath them! U-um.
Curter. I mean. More Curt.
Hm. You know, you are really far ahead... Is it rude to admit I'm a bit curious about... Your other styles?
I believe in you. Don't give up!
Even if you take off your dress, the person under it is what really matters! I-I mean...
It can get... breezy in Paris. I'd really rather not show my underwear if I don't want to.
I like fashion a lot, but uhm. I think I move too much for skirts to be part of my warddrobe.
O-of course you’d wear underwear under your clothes!
The only person I can think of that doesn’t wear underwear under her clothes is Raven…
Z-zone might be lewd enough to go without underwear, but I don’t think you’re like that, Florina!
I have a feeling that Zone-tan just assumes most women are naked under their clothes. I mean, wot nearing under...Not wearing underwear!
You’re mean *and* slutty. It’s a shame San Fransokyo U wasted a spot on you. Even Max didn’t get in!
Oh, you want to try and slap me? Bring it on!
Well, I’ve shown you mine, so I hope you don’t mind showing me yours? Y-your secret identity, that is! Definitely not anything else. Um...
You know, about taking it all off?
W-wouldn’t that get really drafty, Florina? And if you move, everyone would see… Well, everything.
It’s black! I think I’ve figured out how your powers work! You drain people’s color to black, then… Um… I don’t know.
Oh! You have such nice legs, Meg! I don’t think anyone minds you showing those off.
Hmm, a matching set, I hope? It's not polka dots, but I like patterns a lot!
Erk. I’ve never shirted a stranger either.
Um. Ann, are you staring because you like Nagisa, or because her bra looks like sweets?
Oh! I tend not to match my underwear either unless… Uhm. I’m planning on losing it.
W-well, I’m glad you’re still in the game, Nagisa!
You seem a bit embarrassed, but keep your composure I'm sure you know how to *rise* to the challenge!
Is that huge sword just like… A centerpiece of some sort?
U-uhm. Yes. Yes we did just see that, Ruby. Good thing you don’t seem to like sheer panties…
With all three of here, we're almost a ladybug sandwich! With me right in the middle!
Is this Metroid I hear so much about the name of your Kwami?
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, D.Va?
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, Samus?
guess my Japanese is worse than I thought… Hmm… I thought I’d get along really well with her…
Ghosts don’t usually wear a lot of clothes… W-wait, that’s not just… part…
You can't rely on a superhero to come save you.
A ladybug can't change her spots, but maybe you can, Vriska.
I hope whatever you picked next is a bit more unique to you instead of trying to mock me.
I still haven't forgiven you, you know. You've been really rude all game.
Maybe this next set'll be a bit humbling for you.
But nothing like you.
Or as flexible, because I usually take my time in the mornings. To, um, get to classes and such.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
~name~ has really pretty eyes, and a good sense of herself.
Oh. I-, um. I guess that’s okay.
And costume for… Oh.
I can call you that, right? Now that we’re both unmasked?
The rest of you looks much better. Um. Especially the... Not clothes parts.
Yeah, sandals are a bit... Um. (How do I say they're not attractive without being really mean?)
Ah, ~name~, you look beautiful!
I was expecting a climax to this episode, but not like that!
U-um. I think ~name~ is definitely finished. And besides, isn’t...Cum...I mean um! That’s the point!
Florina, are you… Interested in ~name~?
Comment impoli d’associer un point culminant a la mort, Spooky.
Goddess or no, I see you have a wide variety of skills, Zizou.
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me. You're safe now, go on home… Um, when the game’s over.
Oh no! Aimee!? A-are you okay?
Okay. She’s done, but just because she’s naked doesn’t mean we can trust her.
You did great, Florina! You should be proud for keeping up your resolve, and for singing such a cool song!
No more masturbating for you, a-kyu-ma. I definitely won’t forget about what Kyu did tonight, Kyu.
About taste... I wonder if you’d be like freshly cut grass, given... everything you’ve shown and talked about.
That play was… Adorable! Nagisa, but you don’t need to be so embarrassed by what everyone does! Even... me!
You know, mecha were always fascinating to me. That’s by far the most erotic way it’s ever been explained to me!
Wait! You're Sharla! Oh goodness. I'm so sorry it took so long to remember.
E-er. This is kinda a lot more wet than when you were in your swimsuit, Vriska... I feel a little bad. Well, a little.
Time to de-evilize! Oh no, I don’t have my yoyo! Wait a minute… Oh... It was just Zizou’s magic.
Mine might be small but they’re up to the test.
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.
W-well. ~name~, you're n-not really from my normal palette when it comes to designing clothes...
Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
I-
Again!?
I guess you could say you missed the forest for the leaves!
Is... IS THAT BLOOD?
That’s blood, isn’t it? Possessed or not, you need to be stopped, Ayano! You’re insane! I won’t let you win!
Try having two identities and a bunch of friends with crushes on each other.
H-hey! Sait a wecond! W-wait a second! Were you naked this whole time!?
H-hold on there, Felicia! W-what are you--?
Oh, so there’s a good twist, right--
What’s the sitch Kim? Just comparing catchphrases!
Don’t bug out, Kim...Just compare our catchphrases!
Oooh! I don’t usually get to see other people do that! Well, Alya a few times…
Did someone shame you for your body? Is that why you're like this?
Moon, we can already see...
Wow, your uniform is surprisingly… Compressive. I-Impressive?
W-wait a second!
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
Oh! I do. Your breasts are--
I’m sorry, it seems you… Um, have gotten rather naked.
Shazza, you're a lot bigger in person than I expected! I just hadn't gotten the chance to say it.
Surrender, Shego! The two of us have you cornered! Give up!
Hmm... That's an interesting trick, Twilight. I'm glad you're staying modest!
Hmm... I wonder if Buffy taught you that, or if she's just a really fast learner...

(I know what it's like to have a bunch of magic you aren't sure what to do with... I should try and be a little nicer, if just to make her lower her guard so I can break that die of hers and release the akuma.)
(She puts up a tough act. But she's probably just scared and really insecure... I can't even tell if she's akumatized. I mostly just... Feel bad for her. I should be a little nicer.)
You're really confusing, Yang. You seem to be able to really have a lot of fun, but you aren't obnoxious...
That’s not bad at all to look at.
But I’ve never seen an akuma take over clothing that small before.
At least the game is kind of fun. A little bit.
Whoa, Sonya. That's... Wow, body paint. I didn't think I was into this. I guess I am, though.
Zoey, what do you mean by rodeo?
Shimmy? Oh! That’s a fun word to say! Shimmy...Shimmy...Shimmy...Erk. Sorry, ~name~, I got distracted...
I’m sure, even faced with a tentacle monster, ~name~ would hold her ground, Zone! No wardrobe destruction. Or. Um. Destruction of orifices.
Erm, Aimee... This seems very, very dangerous. And if a hero is telling you that...
At very least, I don't have to worry about you as a villain... You seem to only hit yourself...
Don’t worry, Florina! I’m sure Huey was safely out of range!
A-Aimee, I'd use my Lucky Charm to reverse time if you made a mistake, but there's no akumas here for me to use it on...
A-Aimee, I might die of embarrassment, but if you do that wrong, you'll actually die!
Aimee! You sure aren’t making sounds like that was a sure shot! Be careful!
Erm. If you do though, could you please *not* bring it here?
Hmm... Maybe now's not a great time, but could you do... Fashion Victim by Green Day?
Alpha, I know you're digital but... You're pretty and definitely express your personality well. That's all you.
Wow! Those are cool tattoos, Blackrose!
U-um, those are tattoos, right? Those wavy things, and not scars? R-right?
H-hey Aimee! I-I just work with someone that's just as cute--I mean looks like her!
O-oh. Well, this is embarrassing. I’m not really used to… Um… A scenario where something like you wasn’t just possessed.
Well, I guess Alpha is an AI that’s not possessed… I think. I’m keeping an eye on you, Chica.
I really think well-made armor can keep you really mobile, right? Maybe just not as mobile as me.
I'm really not one for armor, but my suit does really increase my pain tolerance and agility.
I'd say you're finally coming out of your shell, Corrin, but you definitely seem fine with this.
(She looks kind of like a frillier, female Adrien... Hmm...)
I think most people know a breastplate is also a chestplate. Don’t get so worried, Florina!
Aww! You two are so sweet on each other!
I understand how you feel, Florina, but nothing’s wrong. You’re doing great!
That sounds really embarrassing... Is that why you're so... O-oh. N-nevermind.
W-wait a second, t-that's-- That's so vulgar, GoGo!
Well! I applaud you being so clever! I’m definitely not sure what it would be like to take mine off piecemeal like that.
Futaba, I mean… I'm still interested in men but Gwen’s… Impressive in her own right...
It's not like I haven't had a similar bond with some of the villains I've fought...
I’m so sorry. I wish my Lucky Charm could heal those. You’re still an amazing detective, I can tell even from this game…
I run and jump a lot to get this toned, I’m a bit jealous you’re naturally like that.
I-I tend to get a little nervous when I’m exposed like this. You’re definitely making my night, I pink.
N-no?
J-just because I don’t get a lot of chances to look at body art. But even without the art you’re really… You know…
O-oh. I guess it didn’t work… Maybe she meant Thoth, like that Egyptian god the Pharaoh channeled?
W-w-wait!? Where'd all the bats come from!?
Um...I don’t know about that. Maybe you’re a warmer person than me?
They’re very classy, Nugi-chan. I recognize high quality clothing anywhere, and I’ll make sure they’re treated well!
I-I do mean sandals. M-meaning sandals are fine for the beach and your clothes, I just don’t like them. I-I’m not looking at your… Butt.
I’ve never really seen a statuesque person undress before, so this is a bit novel to me.
Palutena, I do have to wonder what a goddess looks like under her um...last lines of defense.
And you certainly seem enchanting! I guess if you're not akumatized, you're alright by me!
One piece of clothing at a time! Er... Hopefully losing here will make you rethink things?
I could tie her up with my yo-yo but I think she’d like that far too much...
I mean, you’re an attractive woman taking off her clothes… Wait, did you mean… Your feet?
Er… What, the feet? Is this a thing people…
Bye-bye little butterfly.
Um. Aella, I feel like we're due for a random encounter soon. It looks like it's going to be a big one...
I’d let him storm my Normandy.
You say this Camilla is your wife? She must be a very patient woman!
Um! I'll-- Um! I-I'm actually really excited to see this.
Show me what you have, hero.
O-oh. Oh no, I have very much misinterpreted this relationship. I am so sorry.
You’ve already seen what’s under my costume, what more could you want?
Sorry, what were you saying about cheating? You’ve been like that for way too many hands, D.Va…
I don’t cheat! I’m just innately lucky. You’re one to talk, Ms. No-Miraculous-But Miraculously-Good-At-Games!
What? Queen Bee? Already? Where?
Um...Sorry… Queen Bee is a… Frenemy? I don’t think you’d know her, Florina.
Huey? Who is Huey?
I have to say, Florina, you’ve given me a good memory that I’ll laugh about after I have some acupuncture...
Korra, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman? Can you use your spirit powers to talk to her?
Marceline, I’m sorry. I guess I know how must feel to be hunted, when all you’re trying to do is be a good person. And you are a good person. And I’m sorry for being...persistent.
Um, Meia, I was thinking about what you said... Earlier. Earth has lots of ladybugs! It’s what inspired my costume!
Birth control? Oh, um. Not that I-I really need it that much, but when I do, I make sure sure that appropriate measures are in place so I can feel my partner’s skin on mine.
Hmm...Have you heard of a Nue, Nagisa? I feel like it’d be a cool subject for a play! Kwami are kind of similar!
Nagisa, I don’t want to look for too long but it seems like you have a normal... butt... to me.
W-wait, this is your first time? Looks like we have even more in common than I thought, Nagisa!
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? I hear those types of stories are really popular, especially if the ghost is trying to help the living be happy!
Tikki, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman…
Hm. Nagisa, I don’t mean to frighten you, but do you know someone named Fuko-chan?
You know, Nagisa, if you were going to have a Miraculous, I have a feeling a Starfish might work really well for you!
W-wait, you’re not real, Nugi-chan? You’re an AI like Alpha?
Palutena, you’ve got me thinking that Tikki is a bit more powerful than you let on. You supply your champions with all kinds of...lucky charms, don’t you?
Clothes aren’t evil, Ryuko! Your taste could use some work though.
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? Not like Spooky… Someone friendly, trying to do the right thing!
Oh! Your pegasus! I cannot get over how cool that is, Florina!
This should work!
Alright! This isn’t so bad...
Hmm...
Everything is going to be okay.
You know, I feel like more heroes should use shields, Cap. If I spin my yo-yo just right, I can use it to block attacks. I’d um. Show you, but...
I heard someone say there was something cursed? I happen to have just to have a reliable solution to that!
I’m not going to go easy. I’m here to win, but I’m also not out to shame anyone!
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
D.Va, my costume has been worn by all sorts of people over the years. I haven’t heard of Widowmaker. Is he some kind of bodysuit designer?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat? D.Va, better watch out, as she's the bunniest of all of us!
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat?
Oh! Well, that's an interesting story, Dark Magician Girl. Though I like your hair as it is now! (Even the lack thereof on your...)
Don’t worry, Florina! I may not be a tank, but I’m pretty durable and I’ll make sure you have nothing to be afraid of!
Believe in yourself, Florina! You can be brave all on your own. Be proud of your body and heart!
Don’t worry, Florina! Lyn is here, and she’ll keep you safe, even if I can’t.
Wow, Futaba, you're really attached to your headphones. Even though you're um... Losing.
Hey, Futaba, you seem really attached to those headphones. They’re very nice, but, it’s not like they’re magic, right? Do you need those to activate your Miraculous-- Erk, your Persona?
I-I… I don't--I mean, if you're offering, Futaba, you’re pretty! B-but you remind me a little too much of Alya for it not to be weird...
U-uh-um. I wouldn't sorry about--wouldnt worry about that… What about you?
(Futaba, your secret identity is Medjed, right? I'm really impressed by the good you do! It can be a little hard to cover all the white collar crime.)
We both go with what works, I think. I bet we’d have a lot of fun finding you new clothes, Futaba! I can be punky too!
E-er-- I like Gwen. Like. Um, you know, like, Gah! I’m just-- I’m… Erk.
Aww, Futaba has a boyfriend! I think? That’s adorable!
Have you heard of the Ladyblog, Futaba?
The Ladyblog gets the good parts. Mostly! About, you know, superhero stuff. (I wonder if it's me or Futaba that needs to get out more...)
Maybe I should pick up a copy of the Bugle. Or maybe you should start a blog, Gwen. I’d leave this out, though, oui?
MLB? Isn’t that like… A sport, in America? And did you just call me cute?
U-um. I guess if you can get me to lose, you’ll find out.
I’d be interested to see how you interact with reporters, Gwen!
Well, not in this universe, Gwen! Y-you can hardly blame me for, um, being imprecise. I’m sorry if I hurt your feelings!
Well, Gwen, according to *my* canon, yes! I’d love to visit it again. We could go swinging through the skyscrapers together!
Hey! English isn’t my first language. Don’t be rude… But how’d you get a d’aww reel? Erk. Raw deal?
Under where, my suit? Magic, Gwen, obviously.
Gwen, do you *like* it when I speak to you in French?
Sorry, I’m a little… startled by butterflies. It’s what you might say is… An occupational hazard.

state.i: Meia? Vraiment, salope? Tu veux entrer dans ça?

case.state: Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Um. Nagisa, I hate to tell you this but after careful scrutiny there’s no odd scar there. Just a crack.
Sei, your armor looks kind of like Hawkmoth…
Wait, there’s a club for people like us? And I wasn’t invited! I’d love to be a part!
Uh, Sei, when you frame Hawk Moth that way it is really creepy…
You’re good at feeling up holes, Sheena? Oh my that’s forwa-- Oh. I-I thought you tripped over your words. Erm. (I’m going to go die of embarrassment now.)
See, Spooky? You gave me a big scare!
Y-yow did hou!? W-what the-- Vriska! Stop it!
It has to be snug, Vriska! Or else it's an impediment to mobility!
G-gah! How dare you i-imply!
Moi? Affame d'attention?! How dare you, Vriska!
Hey Kyu, do you think you'd be a good influence on Vriska? With that blue outfit of hers, I feel like she could use a fairy guide.
Zizou… Sorry, that was brave of you, I just get freaked out by purple butterflies. For obvious reasons.
Je veux... coucher... Zone-tan, now? I think we’re a bit busy to take a nap.
Je veux... coucher... O-oh! Zone! W-well… M-maybe once I know you’re not possessed.
Zone-tan, I was thinking about tentacles...I do kind of cover myself with magic armor regularly… Maybe you find tentacles a similar comfort? N-not the probing…
W-wait Zone-tan, you didn’t just...Proposition me? Did you?
Wait a minute, is this a ploy to get me on one of your videos!? That is absolutely not okay!
I don’t really understand your fixation with tentacles,Zone…
Don’t get cold feet, everyone! Stay positive and we shouldn’t have any... um... major embarrassments.
Oh wait a second, I knew I recognized your codenames! You’re those Phantom Thieves they talk about on Heronet, aren’t you!
You know something about spirits? I’d love to talk with you about the Kwami and Miraculouses!
Wow, this is almost like cheating... It’s been a long time since I even came close to losing.
Well, I’m a little naked. But I’m not more naked. And I hope this trend keeps up.
You can’t chalk this up to dumb luck. Just a smart Ladybug.
Clever tricks and luck go a long way. I wonder if I can make it an even 10 turns...
Dealer, meis sens are out, can you give me ~cards~ good cards?
~cards~, please. You’d think red and black would be lucky for me...
~cards~, so at least my hand matches my long-gone costume...
U-uhm. Was… Shaving an expectation for this?
Being a hero isn’t easy...
I can figure out a lot of the Lucky Charm mechanics...But I can’t save this hand!
Wait a second...You and Dawn aren’t really together, are you? Sorry for um… Reading too much into that, April!
Cat Noir’s humor must be really rubbing off on me. Like he tries to.
Well... I hope everyone gets to enjoy some style I usually don’t share.

,I can't believe you didn't wear underwear!

~name~ is adored by her fans, and is used to facing danger. You better watch your threats, Ayano!
Just because ~name~ is misguided, doesn’t mean that she doesn’t have redeeming qualities. Maybe if you didn’t pick on her, she wouldn’t do what she does?
Ahh!!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
Your taste is very vintage, and very eclectic.
Like... I think you'd look great in a red jumpsuit!
Wait, you’re taking your skirt off first?
Those are… Impressive!
Um… It’s a very haute chic look, April! But yes, we can… See what you’re wearing underneath.
E-even though you're losing your dress, I want you to stay proud, because I know what it's like to have two very different parents, and to meet so many... interesting people.
Er... Had. It's weird you haven't found a kwami for yourself...
E-er, don’t get down Ayano, it’s... Just a game.
Based on how you’ve acted towards everyone else, I kind of hope you do get akumatized. Maybe it’d give you perspective once I fix you.
...And Blackrose is so fiery...I just thought...
Whoa! Buffy, that's a neat trick.
Hmm... Corrin, I get the feeling you just kind of throw on whatever you have...
You know, I usually go clothes shopping with Alya, but if you wanted to get something new, it might fun.
D.Va, now that you’re out of your suit, can I call you Hana? I think it’s a way cooler name!
Hm… We have a lot of bodysuits here today… And interesting figures underneath them! U-um.
Curter. I mean. More Curt.
Hm. You know, you are really far ahead... Is it rude to admit I'm a bit curious about... Your other styles?
I believe in you. Don't give up!
Even if you take off your dress, the person under it is what really matters! I-I mean...
It can get... breezy in Paris. I'd really rather not show my underwear if I don't want to.

O-of course you’d wear underwear under your clothes!

Z-zone might be lewd enough to go without underwear, but I don’t think you’re like that, Florina!
I have a feeling that Zone-tan just assumes most women are naked under their clothes. I mean, wot nearing under...Not wearing underwear!

Oh, you want to try and slap me? Bring it on!

You know, about taking it all off?
W-wouldn’t that get really drafty, Florina? And if you move, everyone would see… Well, everything.
Oh! You have such nice legs, Meg! I don’t think anyone minds you showing those off.
Hmm, a matching set, I hope? It's not polka dots, but I like patterns a lot!
Erk. I’ve never shirted a stranger either.
Um. Ann, are you staring because you like Nagisa, or because her bra looks like sweets?
Oh! I tend not to match my underwear either unless… Uhm. I’m planning on losing it.
W-well, I’m glad you’re still in the game, Nagisa!
You seem a bit embarrassed, but keep your composure I'm sure you know how to *rise* to the challenge!
Is that huge sword just like… A centerpiece of some sort?
U-uhm. Ruby, are you deliberately flashing me since I’m so far behind?
With all three of here, we're almost a ladybug sandwich! With me right in the middle!
Is this Metroid I hear so much about the name of your Kwami?
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, D.Va?
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, Samus?
guess my Japanese is worse than I thought… Hmm… I thought I’d get along really well with her…
Ghosts don’t usually wear a lot of clothes… W-wait, that’s not just… part…
You can't rely on a superhero to come save you.
A ladybug can't change her spots, but maybe you can, Vriska.
I hope whatever you picked next is a bit more unique to you instead of trying to mock me.

Maybe this next set'll be a bit humbling for you.
But nothing like you.
Or as flexible, because I usually take my time in the mornings. To, um, get to classes and such.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
~name~ has really pretty eyes, and a good sense of herself.
Wonderful. I’ve shown you almost everything... And that’s the best you do?
Um. I’ve kind of taken off... and you’re just now...
Y-you’re doing a lot better than I am. T-that’s all.
The rest of you looks much better. Um. Especially the... Not clothes parts.
Yeah, sandals are a bit... Um. (How do I say they're not attractive without being really mean?)
Ah, ~name~, you look beautiful!
I was expecting a climax to this episode, but not like that!
U-um. I think ~name~ is definitely finished. And besides, isn’t...Cum...I mean um! That’s the point!

Comment impoli d’associer un point culminant a la mort, Spooky.
Goddess or no, I see you have a wide variety of skills, Zizou.
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me. You're safe now, go on home… Um, when the game’s over.
Oh no! Aimee!? A-are you okay?
Okay. She’s done, but just because she’s naked doesn’t mean we can trust her.
You did great, Florina! You should be proud for keeping up your resolve, and for singing such a cool song!
No more masturbating for you, a-kyu-ma. I definitely won’t forget about what Kyu did tonight, Kyu.
About taste... I wonder if you’d be like freshly cut grass, given... everything you’ve shown and talked about.
That play was… Adorable! Nagisa, but you don’t need to be so embarrassed by what everyone does! Even... me!
You know, mecha were always fascinating to me. That’s by far the most erotic way it’s ever been explained to me!
Wait! You're Sharla! Oh goodness. I'm so sorry it took so long to remember.
E-er. This is kinda a lot more wet than when you were in your swimsuit, Vriska... I feel a little bad. Well, a little.
Time to de-evilize! Oh no, I don’t have my yoyo! Wait a minute… Oh... It was just Zizou’s magic.
Well, it isn’t as though I’m not setting precedence for this...
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
W-well, at least I'm not the only one who can get... A little jealous of... Um. you know. Larger chests.
A-admit it, ~name~, boob've yin-- E-er! You've been! W-waiting to take those out, huh?
I wouldn't mind, um. Taking your measurements, ~name~. S-since we're naked anyway...
As a fashion designer, I can confidently tell you that your breasts are just about perfect. For um. Covering with clothes! Yep!
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I-if you're anything mike lee-- l-like me, um--
I-if you're at all like me, ~name~...
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.

Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
I-
Again!?
I guess you could say you missed the forest for the leaves!
Is... IS THAT BLOOD?
That’s blood, isn’t it? Possessed or not, you need to be stopped, Ayano! You’re insane! I won’t let you win!
Try having two identities and a bunch of friends with crushes on each other.
H-hey! Sait a wecond! W-wait a second! Were you naked this whole time!?
H-hold on there, Felicia! W-what are you--?
Oh, so there’s a good twist, right--
What’s the sitch Kim? Just comparing catchphrases!
Don’t bug out, Kim...Just compare our catchphrases!
Oooh! I don’t usually get to see other people do that! Well, Alya a few times…
Did someone shame you for your body? Is that why you're like this?
Moon, we can already see...
Wow, your uniform is surprisingly… Compressive. I-Impressive?
W-wait a second!
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
Oh! I do. Your breasts are--
I’m sorry, it seems you… Um, have gotten rather naked.
Shazza, you're a lot bigger in person than I expected! I just hadn't gotten the chance to say it.
Surrender, Shego! The two of us have you cornered! Give up!
Hmm... That's an interesting trick, Twilight. I'm glad you're staying modest!
Hmm... I wonder if Buffy taught you that, or if she's just a really fast learner...

(I know what it's like to have a bunch of magic you aren't sure what to do with... I should try and be a little nicer, if just to make her lower her guard so I can break that die of hers and release the akuma.)
(She puts up a tough act. But she's probably just scared and really insecure... I can't even tell if she's akumatized. I mostly just... Feel bad for her. I should be a little nicer.)
That’s not bad at all to look at.
It’s miraculous that you’re so far ahead...
But I think losing your ~clothing~ is making me excited?
Whoa, Sonya. That's... Wow, body paint. I didn't think I was into this. I guess I am, though.
Zoey, what do you mean by rodeo?
Shimmy? Oh! That’s a fun word to say! Shimmy...Shimmy...Shimmy...Erk. Sorry, ~name~, I got distracted...
I’m sure, even faced with a tentacle monster, ~name~ would hold her ground, Zone! No wardrobe destruction. Or. Um. Destruction of orifices.
Erm, Aimee... This seems very, very dangerous. And if a hero is telling you that...
At very least, I don't have to worry about you as a villain... You seem to only hit yourself...
Don’t worry, Florina! I’m sure Huey was safely out of range!
A-Aimee, I'd use my Lucky Charm to reverse time if you made a mistake, but there's no akumas here for me to use it on...
A-Aimee, I might die of embarrassment, but if you do that wrong, you'll actually die!
Aimee! You sure aren’t making sounds like that was a sure shot! Be careful!
Erm. If you do though, could you please *not* bring it here?
Hmm... Maybe now's not a great time, but could you do... Fashion Victim by Green Day?
Alpha, I know you're digital but... You're pretty and definitely express your personality well. That's all you.
Wow! Those are cool tattoos, Blackrose!
U-um, those are tattoos, right? Those wavy things, and not scars? R-right?
H-hey Aimee! I-I just work with someone that's just as cute--I mean looks like her!
O-oh. Well, this is embarrassing. I’m not really used to… Um… A scenario where something like you wasn’t just possessed.
Well, I guess Alpha is an AI that’s not possessed… I think. I’m keeping an eye on you, Chica.
I really think well-made armor can keep you really mobile, right? Maybe just not as mobile as me.
I'm really not one for armor, but my suit does really increase my pain tolerance and agility.
I'd say you're finally coming out of your shell, Corrin, but you definitely seem fine with this.
(She looks kind of like a frillier, female Adrien... Hmm...)
I think most people know a breastplate is also a chestplate. Don’t get so worried, Florina!
Aww! You two are so sweet on each other!

That sounds really embarrassing... Is that why you're so... O-oh. N-nevermind.

Well! I applaud you being so clever! I’m definitely not sure what it would be like to take mine off piecemeal like that.
Futaba, I mean… I'm still interested in men but Gwen’s… Impressive in her own right...
It's not like I haven't had a similar bond with some of the villains I've fought...
I’m so sorry. I wish my Lucky Charm could heal those. You’re still an amazing detective, I can tell even from this game…
I run and jump a lot to get this toned, I’m a bit jealous you’re naturally like that.

Palutena, I do have to wonder what a goddess looks like under her um...last lines of defense.
And you certainly seem enchanting! I guess if you're not akumatized, you're alright by me!
One piece of clothing at a time! Er... Hopefully losing here will make you rethink things?
I could tie her up with my yo-yo but I think she’d like that far too much...
I mean, you’re an attractive woman taking off her clothes… Wait, did you mean… Your feet?
Er… What, the feet? Is this a thing people…
I’m not far behind you... Which is a nice place to be, but maybe I’d rather be in front of you?
Um. Aella, I feel like we're due for a random encounter soon. It looks like it's going to be a big one...
R-really, ~name~? H-how must your partners feel, i-if that's what your--
T-this is a joke, right? Ha-ha, very funny, ~name~, surely you're hiding a salami in your underwear, which is gross but--
O-oh, this'll be... Mmmf.
(I'm hoping ~name~'s a grower and not a shower about now...)
(I can make do with a lot, but sometimes is it so wrong to want just a big, fat...)
I’d let him storm my Normandy.
You say this Camilla is your wife? She must be a very patient woman!
Um! I'll-- Um! I-I'm actually really excited to see this.
Show me what you have, hero.
O-oh. Oh no, I have very much misinterpreted this relationship. I am so sorry.
It’s not the arc de triomphe, but I hope everyone else can appreciate the view.
Even though you got me to take off my bra, my panties are staying on this time!
Sorry, what were you saying about cheating? You’ve been like that for way too many hands, D.Va…
I don’t cheat! I’m just innately lucky. You’re one to talk, Ms. No-Miraculous-But Miraculously-Good-At-Games!
What? Queen Bee? Already? Where?
Um...Sorry… Queen Bee is a… Frenemy? I don’t think you’d know her, Florina.
Huey? Who is Huey?
Korra, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman? Can you use your spirit powers to talk to her?
Marceline, I’m sorry. I guess I know how must feel to be hunted, when all you’re trying to do is be a good person. And you are a good person. And I’m sorry for being...persistent.
Um, Meia, I was thinking about what you said... Earlier. Earth has lots of ladybugs! It’s what inspired my costume!
Birth control? Oh, um. Not that I-I really need it that much, but when I do, I make sure sure that appropriate measures are in place so I can feel my partner’s skin on mine.
Hmm...Have you heard of a Nue, Nagisa? I feel like it’d be a cool subject for a play! Kwami are kind of similar!
Nagisa, I don’t want to look for too long but it seems like you have a normal... butt... to me.
W-wait, this is your first time? Looks like we have even more in common than I thought, Nagisa!
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? I hear those types of stories are really popular, especially if the ghost is trying to help the living be happy!
Tikki, do you notice that there’s a… Presence near Nagisa? Like a small woman…
Hm. Nagisa, I don’t mean to frighten you, but do you know someone named Fuko-chan?
You know, Nagisa, if you were going to have a Miraculous, I have a feeling a Starfish might work really well for you!
W-wait, you’re not real, Nugi-chan? You’re an AI like Alpha?
Clothes aren’t evil, Ryuko! Your taste could use some work though.
Nagisa, if a Nue isn’t quite your style… Maybe something about a ghost girl? Not like Spooky… Someone friendly, trying to do the right thing!
Oh! Your pegasus! I cannot get over how cool that is, Florina!
This is as bad as it gets, right?
I wish I was a bit safer...
This hand is less than ideal...
This is… Not terribly exciting.
Er… Can I mulligan?
You know, I feel like more heroes should use shields, Cap. If I spin my yo-yo just right, I can use it to block attacks. I’d um. Show you, but...
I heard someone say there was something cursed? I happen to have just to have a reliable solution to that!
I’m not going to go easy. I’m here to win, but I’m also not out to shame anyone!
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
I really don’t get the heal of pot springs... .Erk, appeal of hot springs.
D.Va, my costume has been worn by all sorts of people over the years. I haven’t heard of Widowmaker. Is he some kind of bodysuit designer?
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat? D.Va, better watch out, as she's the bunniest of all of us!
Oh! Can you actually pull a rabbit out of your hat?
Oh! Well, that's an interesting story, Dark Magician Girl. Though I like your hair as it is now! (Even the lack thereof on your...)
Don’t worry, Florina! I may not be a tank, but I’m pretty durable and I’ll make sure you have nothing to be afraid of!
Believe in yourself, Florina! You can be brave all on your own. Be proud of your body and heart!
Don’t worry, Florina! Lyn is here, and she’ll keep you safe, even if I can’t.
Wow, Futaba, you're really attached to your headphones. Even though you're um... Losing.
Hey, Futaba, you seem really attached to those headphones. They’re very nice, but, it’s not like they’re magic, right? Do you need those to activate your Miraculous-- Erk, your Persona?
I-I… I don't--I mean, if you're offering, Futaba, you’re pretty! B-but you remind me a little too much of Alya for it not to be weird...
U-uh-um. I wouldn't sorry about--wouldnt worry about that… What about you?
(Futaba, your secret identity is Medjed, right? I'm really impressed by the good you do! It can be a little hard to cover all the white collar crime.)
We both go with what works, I think. I bet we’d have a lot of fun finding you new clothes, Futaba! I can be punky too!
E-er-- I like Gwen. Like. Um, you know, like, Gah! I’m just-- I’m… Erk.
Aww, Futaba has a boyfriend! I think? That’s adorable!
Have you heard of the Ladyblog, Futaba?
The Ladyblog gets the good parts. Mostly! About, you know, superhero stuff. (I wonder if it's me or Futaba that needs to get out more...)
Maybe I should pick up a copy of the Bugle. Or maybe you should start a blog, Gwen. I’d leave this out, though, oui?
MLB? Isn’t that like… A sport, in America? And did you just call me cute?
U-um. I guess if you can get me to lose, you’ll find out.
I’d be interested to see how you interact with reporters, Gwen!
Well, not in this universe, Gwen! Y-you can hardly blame me for, um, being imprecise. I’m sorry if I hurt your feelings!
Well, Gwen, according to *my* canon, yes! I’d love to visit it again. We could go swinging through the skyscrapers together!
Hey! English isn’t my first language. Don’t be rude… But how’d you get a d’aww reel? Erk. Raw deal?
Under where, my suit? Magic, Gwen, obviously.
Gwen, do you *like* it when I speak to you in French?
Sorry, I’m a little… startled by butterflies. It’s what you might say is… An occupational hazard.

state.i: Meia? Vraiment, salope? Tu veux entrer dans ça?

case.state: Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Um. Nagisa, I hate to tell you this but after careful scrutiny there’s no odd scar there. Just a crack.
Sei, your armor looks kind of like Hawkmoth…
Wait, there’s a club for people like us? And I wasn’t invited! I’d love to be a part!
Uh, Sei, when you frame Hawk Moth that way it is really creepy…
Y-yow did hou!? W-what the-- Vriska! Stop it!
It has to be snug, Vriska! Or else it's an impediment to mobility!
G-gah! How dare you i-imply!
Moi? Affame d'attention?! How dare you, Vriska!
Hey Kyu, do you think you'd be a good influence on Vriska? With that blue outfit of hers, I feel like she could use a fairy guide.
Zizou… Sorry, that was brave of you, I just get freaked out by purple butterflies. For obvious reasons.
Je veux... coucher... Zone-tan, now? I think we’re a bit busy to take a nap.
Je veux... coucher... O-oh! Zone! W-well… M-maybe once I know you’re not possessed.
Zone-tan, I was thinking about tentacles...I do kind of cover myself with magic armor regularly… Maybe you find tentacles a similar comfort? N-not the probing…
W-wait Zone-tan, you didn’t just...Proposition me? Did you?
Wait a minute, is this a ploy to get me on one of your videos!? That is absolutely not okay!
I don’t really understand your fixation with tentacles,Zone…
Don’t get cold feet, everyone! Stay positive and we shouldn’t have any... um... major embarrassments.
Oh wait a second, I knew I recognized your codenames! You’re those Phantom Thieves they talk about on Heronet, aren’t you!
You know something about spirits? I’d love to talk with you about the Kwami and Miraculouses!
Well, I’m a little naked. But I’m not more naked. And I hope this trend keeps up.
E-er. I might have to start playing a little more poorly. I’m. Um. Getting un petit cochonne.
Clever tricks and luck go a long way. I wonder if I can make it an even 10 turns...
Dealer, I know I don’t have my yo-yo, but I promise not to tear the cards if you hand me ~cards~.
I’ll need ~cards~ to stay in this...
~cards~, please.
At least if Adrien were here... Or wasn’t here?
Argh, maybe I should be glad Adrien isn’t here...
U-uhm. Was… Shaving an expectation for this?
Er...Palutena, You aren’t actually Tikki in disguise, right? To teach me a lesson or…?
I’m definitely built for ability and perjorance. I mean agility and performance! I-I-
I-it's really easy for me to find clothes that fit. And that makes fashion a lot easier...
(I do appreciate the distraction. I can’t tell if he’s just being nice, or he’s really that interested in ancient history…)
With the way your mech works, D.Va, I imagine you’d feel really… Um… Squished. Be proud of what you have, D.Va!
I have to say, a boyfriend offered to give me a pearl necklace once. I um. Was a little surprised when it wasn't une act sexuel.
I find compliments help. Vous etes tres jolie, means you're pretty.
I-I- Um. Sure? W-why not? Just, you know, be gentle, and *absolutely* no going near… You know. Mon cul.
Pfft. I'm happy with my body, Morrigan. I don't need to have a large chest like yours to be full of heroism!
You know, even though you're kind of mean, Morrigan. I do actually feel a lot better. You're kind of vampy, but you aren't so bad. Maybe.
U-uhm, Sonya, Lucky Charm is kind of a spell. I don't dislike sugary cereal, but... Erk, that's not... It's baffling that you'd consider that the big problem I'm facing!
Unlike some people, I can't just use magic for everything! But I don't need a magic wand to think about Pit later. Though...
I like my chest! It makes apparel easy to work with and simple to borrow shirts! Unlike some people, I can't just use magic for everything!
I don’t think I quite understand…Is this like that American song about chapstick? Well… I might be open to that...
U-hm. That’s very flattering of you, Zone! Normally all the fruit jokes I hear are jokes about bananas…
If you'd like, Pit, I know a great place you can get cherry cream pies!
Y-you know, at this point...I might take you up on that, Zone-tan.
Oh, Zone-tan, you’re talking about that Katy Perry song, right? I kissed a girl and I liked it? Well...I might be open to that. Alpha, can you sing that for us?
Uh, Tikki, are you sure you’re not charged yet?
Uhm. I don't suppose you're willing to take a friendly and heroic loss?
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Ann.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Um. No, Blake, I wasn’t looking at you. Any more than I might usually.
Two in a row *again*? I’m getting streaks of luck. Bad streaks. I can’t help but wonder if a certain black cat is involved…Er, I don’t mean your pet, Mona, Futaba.
Yes, Gwen? Why do you have a glint in your eyes? Your soft… playful blue eyes…
Is shaving there like… A mark of someone that uses a lot of technology, rather than magic?
This is a bit awkward. Just because I have a bodysuit doesn’t mean I… Maybe this is just due to where you’re from?
The two of you have spaceships, so maybe upkeep there is a lot easier? Because I don’t… Er...
W-well, I guess I’m the only girl here who doesn’t… Um… Wax or shave under my suit.
Wait, two in a row? Really?!
Huh? Again? Already? I thought I was playing better…
W-Wow, ~player~, I’m lucky this is just a game. I’d have been...In way worse shape if this were a fight…
