Oh! You have such nice legs, Meg! I don’t think anyone minds you showing those off.
Hmm, a matching set, I hope? It's not polka dots, but I like patterns a lot!
Erk. I’ve never shirted a stranger either.
Um. Ann, are you staring because you like Nagisa, or because her bra looks like sweets?
Oh! I tend not to match my underwear either unless… Uhm. I’m planning on losing it.
W-well, I’m glad you’re still in the game, Nagisa!
You seem a bit embarrassed, but keep your composure I'm sure you know how to *rise* to the challenge!
Is that huge sword just like… A centerpiece of some sort?
Ruby, I’m a bittle lit sissadointed... Little bit disappointed you’re teasing me now that I’m done...
With all three of here, we're almost a ladybug sandwich! With me right in the middle!
Is this Metroid I hear so much about the name of your Kwami?
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
It does seem like a hassle to take off your suit...I’m glad my transformation is so easy!
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, D.Va?
Whoa, your bodysuit regenerates you? Mine only stops me from feeling pain...What does yours do, Samus?
guess my Japanese is worse than I thought… Hmm… I thought I’d get along really well with her…
Ghosts don’t usually wear a lot of clothes… W-wait, that’s not just… part…
A ladybug can't change her spots, but maybe you can, Vriska.
I hope whatever you picked next is a bit more unique to you instead of trying to mock me.
I still haven't forgiven you, you know. You've been really rude all game.
Maybe this next set'll be a bit humbling for you.
But nothing like you.
~name~ is brave. Or she wouldn’t have stayed here.
~name~ has really pretty eyes, and a good sense of herself.
Normally, I like to shower after superheroics... or coming...
Um. I’ve kind of taken off... and you’re just now...
Y-you’re doing a lot better than I am. T-that’s all.
The rest of you looks much better. Um. Especially the... Not clothes parts.
Yeah, sandals are a bit... Um. (How do I say they're not attractive without being really mean?)
Wow!
I was expecting a climax to this episode, but not like that!
U-um. I think ~name~ is definitely finished. And besides, isn’t...Cum...I mean um! That’s the point!
Y-you know Florina, I bet between the two of us and ~name~, we could get… Um… Never mind.
Comment impoli d’associer un point culminant a la mort, Spooky.
Goddess or no, I see you have a wide variety of skills, Zizou.
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me. You're safe now, go on home… Um, when the game’s over.
Oh no! Aimee!? A-are you okay?
Okay. She’s done, but just because she’s naked doesn’t mean we can trust her.
You did great, Florina! You should be proud for keeping up your resolve, and for singing such a cool song!
No more masturbating for you, a-kyu-ma. I definitely won’t forget about what Kyu did tonight, Kyu.
About taste... I wonder if you’d be like freshly cut grass, given... everything you’ve shown and talked about.
That play was… Adorable! Nagisa, but you don’t need to be so embarrassed by what everyone does! Even... me!
You know, mecha were always fascinating to me. That’s by far the most erotic way it’s ever been explained to me!
Wait! You're Sharla! Oh goodness. I'm so sorry it took so long to remember.
E-er. This is kinda a lot more wet than when you were in your swimsuit, Vriska... I feel a little bad. Well, a little.
Time to de-evilize! Oh no, I don’t have my yoyo! Wait a minute… Oh... It was just Zizou’s magic.
In Paris a lot of our statues are topless, and many advocate for “freeing the nipple.”
Oh... Would you look at that. Kind of like... A sunset...
Oh! The light just caught your eyes and-- So cool, ~name~. I-I hope that doesn't sound narcisstic.
Oh! Our eyes match, ~name~! I-I kind of hope our chests don't, though.
You have such deep, pretty eyes, ~name~! Er-- Handsome eyes! Um--! Pick which you like! J-just so you know I'm not staring at your chest!
I heard someone say that boys love it when you show them your brown eyes! You must be really popular, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~, you have a really great skin tone!
You're lucky to have such a nice complexion! I bet it makes it easy to get a lot of sun! N-not that you would without your ~clothing~, of course!
Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?
W-well, at least I'm not the only one who can get... A little jealous of... Um. you know. Larger chests.
A-admit it, ~name~, boob've yin-- E-er! You've been! W-waiting to take those out, huh?
I wouldn't mind, um. Taking your measurements, ~name~. S-since we're naked anyway...
As a fashion designer, I can confidently tell you that your breasts are just about perfect. For um. Covering with clothes! Yep!
Huh. I don't think I've seen eyes that color before. N-not in person, anyway.
Hm... You really don't see a lot of sun, do you, ~name~?
I-I'm not going to lie, pale skin kind of... Makes me a little worried you'll be super creepy, ~name~.
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Red's not a typical eye color. E-er that's not why I feel bad. You losing your... Um... Anyway.
You know, ~name~, I was kinda worried that red eyes would mean you were something evil... But you're not so bad.
I-if you're anything mike lee-- l-like me, um--
I-if you're at all like me, ~name~...
I'm... Not going to lie, ~name~, I've... Um. Well, your skin color is usually only common to akuma victims. Since you're in control of yourself... It's kinda... Hot.
W-well. ~name~, you're n-not really from my normal palette when it comes to designing clothes...
Violet is such a cool eye color! You get the best of blue while still seeing wider color palettes. Um. Or so I learned in school.
I-
Again!?
I guess you could say you missed the forest for the leaves!
Is... IS THAT BLOOD?
That’s blood, isn’t it? Possessed or not, you need to be stopped, Ayano! You’re insane! I won’t let you win!
Try having two identities and a bunch of friends with crushes on each other.
H-hey! Sait a wecond! W-wait a second! Were you naked this whole time!?
H-hold on there, Felicia! W-what are you--?
Oh, so there’s a good twist, right--
What’s the sitch Kim? Just comparing catchphrases!
Don’t bug out, Kim...Just compare our catchphrases!
Oooh! I don’t usually get to see other people do that! Well, Alya a few times…
Did someone shame you for your body? Is that why you're like this?
Moon, we can already see…
Wow, your uniform is surprisingly… Compressive. I-Impressive?
W-wait a second!
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
O-or maybe you're the imposter? I *really* never liked illusion powers.
Oh! I do. Your breasts are--
I’m sorry, it seems you… Um, have gotten rather naked.
Shazza, you're a lot bigger in person than I expected! I just hadn't gotten the chance to say it.
Surrender, Shego! The two of us have you cornered! Give up!
Hmm... That's an interesting trick, Twilight. I'm glad you're staying modest!
Hmm... I wonder if Buffy taught you that, or if she's just a really fast learner...

(I know what it's like to have a bunch of magic you aren't sure what to do with... I should try and be a little nicer, if just to make her lower her guard so I can break that die of hers and release the akuma.)
(She puts up a tough act. But she's probably just scared and really insecure... I can't even tell if she's akumatized. I mostly just... Feel bad for her. I should be a little nicer.)
It's oddly soothing to watch...
And at this rate it looks like I’ll not have a chance to.
Whoa, Sonya. That's... Wow, body paint. I didn't think I was into this. I guess I am, though.
Zoey, what do you mean by rodeo?
Shimmy? Oh! That’s a fun word to say! Shimmy...Shimmy...Shimmy...Erk. Sorry, ~name~, I got distracted...
I’m sure, even faced with a tentacle monster, ~name~ would hold her ground, Zone! No wardrobe destruction. Or. Um. Destruction of orifices.
Erm, Aimee... This seems very, very dangerous. And if a hero is telling you that...
At very least, I don't have to worry about you as a villain... You seem to only hit yourself...
Don’t worry, Florina! I’m sure Huey was safely out of range!
A-Aimee, I'd use my Lucky Charm to reverse time if you made a mistake, but there's no akumas here for me to use it on...
A-Aimee, I might die of embarrassment, but if you do that wrong, you'll actually die!
Aimee! You sure aren’t making sounds like that was a sure shot! Be careful!
Erm. If you do though, could you please *not* bring it here?
Hmm... Maybe now's not a great time, but could you do... Fashion Victim by Green Day?
Alpha, I know you're digital but... You're pretty and definitely express your personality well. That's all you.
Wow! Those are cool tattoos, Blackrose!
U-um, those are tattoos, right? Those wavy things, and not scars? R-right?
H-hey Aimee! I-I just work with someone that's just as cute--I mean looks like her!
O-oh. Well, this is embarrassing. I’m not really used to… Um… A scenario where something like you wasn’t just possessed.
Well, I guess Alpha is an AI that’s not possessed… I think. I’m keeping an eye on you, Chica.
I really think well-made armor can keep you really mobile, right? Maybe just not as mobile as me.
I'm really not one for armor, but my suit does really increase my pain tolerance and agility.
I'd say you're finally coming out of your shell, Corrin, but you definitely seem fine with this.
(She looks kind of like a frillier, female Adrien... Hmm...)
I think most people know a breastplate is also a chestplate. Don’t get so worried, Florina!
Aww! You two are so sweet on each other!
I understand how you feel, Florina, but nothing’s wrong. You’re doing great!
That sounds really embarrassing... Is that why you're so... O-oh. N-nevermind.
W-wait a second, t-that's-- That's so vulgar, GoGo!
Well! I applaud you being so clever! I’m definitely not sure what it would be like to take mine off piecemeal like that.
Futaba, I mean… I'm still interested in men but Gwen’s… Impressive in her own right...
It's not like I haven't had a similar bond with some of the villains I've fought...
I’m so sorry. I wish my Lucky Charm could heal those. You’re still an amazing detective, I can tell even from this game…
I run and jump a lot to get this toned, I’m a bit jealous you’re naturally like that.
I-I tend to get a little nervous when I’m exposed like this. You’re definitely making my night, I pink.
N-no?
J-just because I don’t get a lot of chances to look at body art. But even without the art you’re really… You know…
W-w-wait!? Where'd all the bats come from!?
Um...I don’t know about that. Maybe you’re a warmer person than me?
They’re very classy, Nugi-chan. I recognize high quality clothing anywhere, and I’ll make sure they’re treated well!
I-I do mean sandals. M-meaning sandals are fine for the beach and your clothes, I just don’t like them. I-I’m not looking at your… Butt.
I’ve never really seen a statuesque person undress before, so this is a bit novel to me.
Palutena, I do have to wonder what a goddess looks like under her um...last lines of defense.
And you certainly seem enchanting! I guess if you're not akumatized, you're alright by me!
One piece of clothing at a time! Er... Hopefully losing here will make you rethink things?
I could tie her up with my yo-yo but I think she’d like that far too much...
I mean, you’re an attractive woman taking off her clothes… Wait, did you mean… Your feet?
Er… What, the feet? Is this a thing people…
Hmm...
Um. Aella, I feel like we're due for a random encounter soon. It looks like it's going to be a big one...
R-really, ~name~? H-how must your partners feel, i-if that's what your--
T-this is a joke, right? Ha-ha, very funny, ~name~, surely you're hiding a salami in your underwear, which is gross but--
O-oh, this'll be... Mmmf.
(I'm hoping ~name~'s a grower and not a shower about now...)
(I can make do with a lot, but sometimes is it so wrong to want just a big, fat...)
I’d let him storm my Normandy.
You say this Camilla is your wife? She must be a very patient woman!
Um! I'll-- Um! I-I'm actually really excited to see this.
Show me what you have, hero.
O-oh. Oh no, I have very much misinterpreted this relationship. I am so sorry.
I could definitely use a different kind of “pound it” for a job well done, wouldn’t you say?
Phew. I need to rest for a little bit. Does five minutes seem long enough, ~player~?
O-okay. I guess I’ll just... Wait here a bit.
Is breadybody else hungry? Anybody? Sorry, I could use a pastry. N-not that I was suggesting otherwise.
Well, I suppose the fashionable thing would be to sit here and enjoy... Or maybe, if I could get my sketchbook...
Hm. You know, maybe showing off for other people is part of the appeal of being Ladybug…
Spoonerism? Sut's wats-- What's that supposed to me? Um. And, I think I'll be okay...
Um, Meia, I don’t suppose you want to rephrase your comment about pubic hair? A woman should be allowed to groom as she pleases, you know!
Oh, um. I'm doing pretty well, Morrigan. H-how're you?
A little gross, Morrigan. Not going to lie.
Of course. Who doesn’t enjoy this? I-I mean context is everything but...Everyone does it, right?
Zone? Maybe I’d be willing to try the tentacle thing. Just… Once and no going anywhere near the back!
Hmm... I guess this is the hard part. I’m getting kind of um. Cold. Can someone hot me up? Someone hot come close? Um! Warm me up! Yes! That!
Hmm... That wasn’t a particularly big orgasm... I’m. Um. Normally a little less loud. Because of where I live, it’d be bad ettiquette.
Phew. Okay, I think I’ve caught my breath. Is... there other stuff I should be doing? L-like keeping score, or putting my clothes on?
Well, I didn’t get the akuma, but I did have a good time.
I'm excited to have two new friends to take to Paris. You're coming too, right, ~player~?
Well, hopefully we only have one Elizabeth, as this Paris trip is looking pretty packed. You're in, right, ~player~?
Of course the offer to come to Paris still stands, Elizabeth! It's not like we have any secrets left. But shouldn't we bring ~name~ too?
This shirt's a little short, Gwen, but let nobody say you're not a woman of her word!
I-it's not really supposed to end like this, right? I can't believe an akumatized villain beat me...
I guess I’ll have to hope I can get a Lucky Charm to erase Streaming-chan’s footage. Otherwise, this has to stay between us.
I lost... To a knockoff... Ugh. I hope Lucky Charm can start this all over...

text.content: I am really loving having a sidekick, ~name~.
It *really* makes my life a lot easier with you helping to organize my non-Hero side things.
And…
It’s nice to have someone who can…
Fuck me right.
It’s really hard for me to say stuff like that, ~name~!
B-but, I can see it… You’re really…
Hard too.
Sorry, I haven’t been grooming quite as much.
I’ve been really busy being Ladybug…
Though…
Maybe I have a way to make it up to you. Why don’t you compare Marinette *au naturale*...
And after, I’ll do something new for you to try?
Yes yes oh oui yes oui!
Right there! Oh, yes, please!
Yadmiring our wandihork?
E-er admiring your handwork? Handywork?
Okay, I can’t do what I need to do if I have my hands on your eyes…
So cover up, ~name~.
Hmm...
Okay, if I soap up like this...
Appreciation for Alya, Samus, and Team RWBY’s routines growing…
This is...Challenging.
Hey! Don’t look yet!
If you surprise me I might slip.
Okay… Sorry, ~name~, I’m almost…
Okay! Ready for you!
I know the others that like to wear bodysuits usually do this, so…

content.i: Vous ne pensiez pas que j'allais vous laisser le mettre dans mon cul, n'est-ce pas?

text.content: It… Just seems to be something men think about. And… Um. Some others.
But just not me.
You are going to enjoy this, right?
I just know you like it when I talk dirty to you in French.
So, ~name~, are you ready to go again?
I bet it’ll be… A smooth operation this time.
Mmm... I have been a good hero, Lady Palutena.
O-oh, really? M-more girls with green hair?
Y-yes please…
O-oh. Yes. Good kitty.
A-and yes, I d-do find the pussy jokes...Unf.
Your tongue feels amazing, Blake...
Inside me...
Though I could be in the mood for something...
...Light...
...Cool...
...and a little dangerous...
D-don’t worry, Princess… This is part of my job as Royal Protector too...
I'm so close...
But...
I just... Sort of want...
Wait, ~name~!?
I thought you’d be here at-
It’s already after...
Oh dear. I’m so embarrassed!
Well… You really caught my eye at the game and…
Um. Is it too forward of me to suggest that you…
And me...
I’ve… Never actually… With a girl, but I’ve thought about it…
Want to join me?
I might have a few ideas you can enjoy we can enjoy together.
